title: Hard Rock Cafe
description: Music-themed chain with an American menu. Rock ’n’ roll-themed chain with a high-energy vibe serving burgers & American classics.

reviews_data.snippet: Overall, not a bad experience. Menu was standard HRC. Chose the nachos and cheesecake. Both were good and filling. Customer Service was awesome. Had a nice meal without any drama.

response.snippet: Hello C.K. Thank you so much for your great score, we really appreciate it.For us, customer satisfaction is our top priority and all the teamwork hard to offer the best possible experience when visiting us. Thank you once again for the time to share your visit with us, and hope to see you back very soon.

reviews_data.snippet: As always there are so many people here since it is located at the corner of the famous Pl. Catalyna and the La Ramla street. The service is very nice though, only it takes time to get a seat without a reservation
Good food, big portions, fast service, great customer service. Was a great diner there in family. I highly recommend for group/family dinner.
Exelent cocktails 🍸 strawberry basil limonade

Awesome location, very central and a super friendly & nice staff. We got the nacho to share, which was very tasty - and they had some nice non alcohol drinks to offer as well.If you visit during football game nights or less crowded nights like weekdays that’ll give you an even more chill vibe and atmosphere. Highly recommended.

No clue what they were doing but the service was so terrible (never had a bad experience with any hard rock cafe before). We had to wait 20 minutes before we were asked what we would like to drink, then after that we waited 10 minutes on our drinks, finally after an eternity our food came. Which was weird because it was far from busy.Although the service was bad, the food was pretty good.

response.snippet: Dear Michel, I would like to thank you for taking the time to place your feedback regarding your visit to the Hard Rock Cafe in Barcelona.It is very unfortunate the mishap you experienced in our restaurant, We want to apologize, as this is not the way Hard Rock deals with our clients. We would like to follow this incident up , to it would be of great assistance to me if you could provide me with any additional information by contacting me at the Barcelona Cafe (through our facebook profile or the email that you will find at our website) concerning the name of the Waiter (if known) and the time and date that you visited our cafe.Your participation is very valuable to us. Please be assured that we take your evaluation seriously and have already begun to use your feedback to build a better experience for all of our guests.One of our big concerns is to offer an unforgettable experience in all the Hard Rock Cafe’s worldwide, because customer satisfaction is our top priority.Again we apologize for any inconvenience we may have caused and hope to see you in the Hard Rock Cafe Barcelona again soon.With kind regards,Eric SwansonGeneral ManagerHard Rock Cafe Barcelona

reviews_data.snippet: Great food. Great atmosphere. Covid safety protocols in place. Had the Salmon with veg and seasoned fries.

response.snippet: (Translated by Google) Hi Rachel, Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review. We love to see that we are always giving authentic rock star service! We hope to see you again soon!(Original)Hola Rachel, Muchas gracias por tomarte el tiempo en dejarnos una reseña. ¡Nos encanta ver que estamos siempre dando un servicio autentico de un rock star! ¡Esperamos volver a verte pronto!

reviews_data.snippet: Good place to have a snack and feel some Rock culture

5 for the food and the real nice person (with half long coloured hair) who served it. I had the chicken flat bread and I didn’t expect it that real good! My niece got the Nachos and I am suprised about the taste and the guacamole. I give a 5 because everyone who worked there made us feel comfortable and the food was real good!
Slow service terrible food.!! I have ordered medium well NY steak and i got Well done. I had to call the waiter to cook another one carefully and they gave me another well done steak!!!

response.snippet: Dear Sahar,Thank you very much for sharing your feedback with us. It's very unfortunate that your experience was not as you expected. We work hard to improve daily and, for this reason, we'd like to ask you for more information about your visit. It would be of great assistance if you could provide me with any additional information by contacting me at the Barcelona Cafe (through our facebook profile or the email that you will find at our website) concerning the name of the Waiter (if known), the time and date that you visited our cafe, and if a manager came to the table to address the issues with the quality of your food?Again we apologize for any inconvenience we may have caused and hope to see you in the Hard Rock Cafe Barcelona again soon.With Kind regard ,Eric SwansonGeneral ManagerHard Rock Cafe Barcelona

reviews_data.snippet: Really good places with nice guitars and food was good but a little expensive. We had free brownie though. Music wasn't hard Rock at all :/
Amazing City Hong-Kong i love Barcelona 2

response.snippet: Hello EAC! Cool looking stars! Thank you!

reviews_data.snippet: It’s a very nice place, but there’s a small amount of cocktails. When you want to drink something during the day (outside), that’s possible. Only when it’s evening and you want to eat something, you have to sit outside and inside to drink something.

response.snippet: Dear Luna, I would like to thank you for taking the time to place your feedback regarding your visit to the Hard Rock Cafe in Barcelona on Google. It is very unfortunate that you were not satisfied with your experience with us. We are extremely sorry to hear about this, and even more sorry to disappoint a customer. Next time, please walk right up a manager and voice your concerns. We would like to make sure that such mistakes do not happen again. Your participation is very valuable to us. Please be assured that we take your evaluation seriously and have already begun to use your feedback to build a better experience for all of our guests. Hard Rock strives to combine a casual dining environment, outstanding service and a fun atmosphere. I apologize that your visit fell short of our usual high standards and failed to meet some of your expectations.With kind regards,Eric SwansonGeneral ManagerHard Rock Cafe Barcelona

reviews_data.snippet: Great food. Friendly staff. I would highly recommend.

Nice people. Good service. Less non alcoholic drinks than I expected. The strawberry and mint lemonade ( not a real mocktail) was pretty good.I didn't eat there. I prefer real Spanish food. This is tourist fare .I was kind of insulted when they gave me a plain (no logo) glass (didn't include the glass in the order) as if I would steal it. They must have a real problem with theft of "unpaid" glasses.The bathroom had an elevator and large toilet for less mobile people. Great so far, if only the door would lock properly.

Haven't been to HRC for years but it felt nice to return. This ouet in BCN brought back some nice memories 😊The seating and wait staff were equally friendly, helpful, and efficient, the food was, well, as it's supposed to be 😋I was sorry to realize some eats being gone from the menu but it's clearly not HRC BCN's choice.Still a great place to eat and a freat place to be.Don't go there to have a quiet dinner though - rock'n'roll will wake you up! 🎸🎤🔊🥁

The staff was very rude, especially one of the male managers or team leaders.And the food wasn't anything special, I have had better burgers and service from smaller, less well known burguer restaurants.DO NOT recommend!

We had a terrible experience. Food was not nice and incredibly expensive. Had a steak that was full of fat in every bite (and cost 22 euro!). Chips were clearly a bit old.Manager came to apologise but basically said 'sorry, but our steaks are locally sourced and very good'. They did offer desserts or some drinks on the house but by this point we just wanted to leave.Avoid!
Great food with love music!
Amazing Nacho's!Burgers are to die for, but prices are really exaggerated.Drinks and service were really awesome.If you can afford it, and you like Rock, definitely check it out!

response.snippet: Hello Dumitru, awe we love your review! Makes us happy to know we are giving the best authentic service always. Legends Only - You rock!

reviews_data.snippet: Nice experience and big portions. Wish it had more complementary sauces and salt/pepper. Great location and friendly staff

response.snippet: Hello Erik, Thank you very much for your review! At HRC Barcelona we thrive to give authentic experiences that Rock! We do have complementary sauces, salt and pepper but we have to take them put from the tables and only hand them to the guests when they wish. We are really sorry that this wasn't the case for you. I hope you can understand that it is only for sanitary reasons we need to respect due to Covid. Thank you once again for the time to share your visit with us, and hope to see you back very soon.

reviews_data.snippet: Really nice veggie burger!

response.snippet: Hello Alma, we love your stars! Makes us happy to know you enjoyed our veggie burger! Made with love!  Legends Only - You rock!

reviews_data.snippet: A must visit for all Rock fans, they got Jimi Hendrix's Dobro resonator guitar 🤘

response.snippet: Hello Aditya, we love your stars! Makes us happy to know we are giving the best authentic service always and we also LOVE JIMI an absolute LEGEND!  You rock!

reviews_data.snippet: More artivles then usually in Hard rock stores in the world
"Great experience"Likes: Atmosphere, food and drinks.Dislikes: Can't think of anyRecommendation: Definitely a must, hoping to visit again.
Excellent food and customer service. Very clean and well spaced out. Well worth the visit.
Good staff!!!But....the music should be ever !!!😍Today,I would like to have probably a DJ ( local musical persona) to keep on top spirit of that place

Burger well done instead of medium. A bit too dry. Not really tasty. Service was very good and kind. Atmosphere is OK but not a good hard rock cafe atmosphere. Good for a visit during a vacation. But not for more
Great service, food and recommendations for tapas and sangria in Barcelona!

I came here with my wife two years ago and from visiting many Hard Rock Cafe locations, I can say this was our most enjoyable experience. The service and the quality of food was exceptional that we still talk about it to this day! I can’t wait to come back some time soon I hope.

Big fan of American food. Nice place. Big plates, nice taste and good quality for a rock restaurant. Quick service and very polite also. The prices could be a little lower. But it was one of the days in Barcelona that we left with full stomach, therefore fair enough.

reviews_data.snippet: Food was excellent, my waiter listened to our order, took nothing down and brought back exactly what we ordered! He even went out of his way to make sure the song my daughter asked for was played before we left... 6 star service in my opinion!!!!!

reviews_data.snippet: Hard rock total!!!! Fantasticooo
30 minutes after I arrived in Barcelona, I already met new friends and had a great meal at Hard Rock café Barcelona 😁🤘First time in Barcelona and first time in a Hard Rock café.
Average food bad service
The food was good but the service was extremely poor and unwelcoming. Very disappointed by the service. Do not recommend
Some good stuff, but no music. We asked the bartender why there was no music and he said nothing.Edit: the manager of this cafe is super super nice!

When We've visited this place for the first time, it's been so nice and welcoming. I enjoyed myself, as staff was friendly and kind. We decided to come back on the next day and service was HORRIBLE!Asian Lady, that kept the door was extremely rude and disgustingly out of order. I will never visit again, because of this situation. EVERY employee works for the reputation of a place, and this one is definitely destroying it. I wouldn't recommend this place, unless You like to be spoken to like a trash.

It's a really good experience overall i would recommend 100%

reviews_data.snippet: Greatness! Couldn’t expect less, Hard Rock is Hard Rock. The vibes are so nice. Few beers in the bar and then move on to the table, top it off with a brownie 🙂.. Food coma starting in 3,2,1... Always a must visit,..

response.snippet: Hello Victor,Thank you for your super mega awesome review!! We are ready for round 2 full of entertainment and more food coma! You rock!

reviews_data.snippet: Hard Rock Cafe Barcelona is lively. Good music with TVs to watch videos. Music collections (photographs, guitars) decorate the walls. Small clothing shop to the right and left of entrance. Menu consists of burgers, sandwiches, steak, salad and a good drink selection. Portion size is good. Service is excellent. Food is ok.

reviews_data.snippet: Great service, great food and a cool and casual setting. The memorabilia on the walls is interesting of course. If you are eating, it's better to be seated downstairs as it means there are not tourists wandering around your tables taking photos.

reviews_data.snippet: Food is always great at every hard Rock Cafe. I will say by far this was the worse service ever. I think it was a break room because they all took food in with them. Our waitress never came by to check how food was. We waited about 15 minutes just to place a drink order.

response.snippet: (Translated by Google) Hello thank you for your comment and visit we are glad you liked it, this is Agustín when it is full the kitchen is slower since our dishes are made at the moment, but then on the palate it is also noticed, nothing is reheated or frozen all freshly made It has its good and bad part, we will try to go faster in your next visit.On the prices everything goes to proportion of the quantity and quality of the product, service and local.Desserts we have every day, but the special dessert cake three leches only weekend, we have 3 special dishes that are made exclusively Thursday, Friday and Sunday noon (baleadas, Mexican tacos and soup), the charges are made per table for several reasons that if you ask us we will explain it always, we hope to see something more contributed to your writing, thanks and we hope to see you again soon, regards(Original)Hola gracias por su comentario y visita nos alegra le haya gustado, así es Agustín cuando está lleno la cocina va más lenta ya que nuestros platos se elaboran al momento, pero luego en el paladar también se nota, nada es  recalentado ni congelado todo recién hecho, tiene su parte buena y mala, intentaremos ir más rápido en su próxima visita.Sobre los precios todo va a proporción de la cantidad y calidad del producto, servicio y local.Los postres tenemos todos los días, pero el postre especial tarta tres leches solo fin de semana, tenemos 3 platos especiales que se hacen exclusivamente jueves, viernes y domingo mediodía ( baleadas, tacos mexicanos y sopa ), los cobros se hacen por mesa por varios motivos que si nos preguntan lo explicaremos siempre, esperamos a ver aportado algo más a su escrito, gracias y esperamos volverle a ver pronto, saludos

response.snippet: (Translated by Google) Thank you for your evaluation and visit, regarding your comment, the baleadas very true we only do them on Thursday nights, just like other dishes that are only during the week, the reason is strictly commercial, you have to make different dishes and offers to attract clients that cost so much that they come when it is not weekend or holidays.About not representing Honduran food so much, he will tell me if roasted meat, baleadas, yucca with pork rinds, enchiladas, tacos, fish, fried chicken with slices or chuco, slices with ground meat, seafood soup-mondongo-res and beans with ribs , desserts, cake 3 milks, torrejas in honey among many more ... they are not typical Honduran dishes, another very different thing is that the dish that you like most like the baleadas is not every day, but we are always always open to suggestions , and if you tell us what dish we are missing and would like us to add it we would take it into account, we await your response, thanks and greetings(Original)Gracias por su valoración y visita, respecto a su comentario, las baleadas muy cierto solo las hacemos los jueves noche, igual que otros platos que hay solo entre semana, el motivo es estrictamente comercial, hay que hacer platos y ofertas diferentes para atraer a los clientes que tanto cuesta que vengan cuando no es fin de semana o festivos.Sobre no representar tanto a la comida hondureña ya me dirá si la carne asada, baleadas, yuca con chicharrón, enchiladas, tacos, pescado, pollo frito con tajadas o chuco, tajaditas con carne molida, sopas marinera-mondongo-res y frijoles con costilla, postres, tarta 3 leches, torrejas en miel entre muchos más... no son platos típicos hondureños, otra cosa muy distinta es que el plato que más le gusta como las baleadas no esté todos los días, pero igualmente siempre estamos abiertos a sugerencias, y si nos indica que platillo nos falta y le gustaría que añadiésemos lo tendríamos muy en cuenta, esperamos su respuesta, gracias y saludos

reviews_data.snippet: Very bad attention ... the first day I went and very bad attention for my friends and me, we were a large group and instead of telling us that we will wait for more tables to be vacated and that early we were calling to make a reservation and they never took the phone, with a bad face and they wanted to divide the group .... hey if you go with your group the most logical thing is that everyone eats together if not everyone would go to his ball, we decided to go somewhere else but before paying for the drinks we got to consume and it turns out that the guy that wanted to charge us even the food that an hour ago we had ordered and they had not even served it xfavor..but well anyway, we as customers are not the ones we lose ..Cheers

response.snippet: (Translated by Google) Excuse me but we gave you a table for 4, you came alone, at the time a second person arrived who occupied a table for more than an hour without eating with two fantasies, telling us that they did not know what time the other four people came, you asked for 2 dishes that they did not consume and they also told us to sell to other people, since when the other 4 arrived it had been 2 hours and obviously there was no table for 6, they never called by phone, they even recognized him saying that whoever had recommended them always went without reservation and the boy would kindly attend to him as long as there was a table, I do not know what you expected, we can not have tables of 6 without consuming 2 hours, something logical that will happen in any restaurant, and on the faces if they leave without pay, maybe they expect a smile from the waiters, incredible !!!(Original)Disculpa pero te dimos una mesa para 4, vino usted sola , a la hora llego una Segunda persona que ocuparon una mesa más de una hora sin comer con dos fantas, diciéndonos que no sabían a qué hora venía las otras cuatro personas, ustedes pidieron 2 platos que no consumieron y además nos dijieron que vendiéramos  a otras personas, ya que cuando llegaron las otras 4 había pasado ya 2 horas y evidentemente no había mesa para 6, jamás llamaron por teléfono incluso lo reconocieron diciendo que quien les había recomendado ella siempre iba sin reservar y el chico le atendía amablemente siempre y cuando hubiese mesa, no sé qué esperaba ustedes, no podemos tener mesas de 6 sin consumir 2 horas, algo lógico que le va a pasar en cualquier restaurante, y sobre las caras si se van sin pagar, a lo mejor esperan unas sonrisa de los camareros, increíble!!!

title: A Pluma ‘The Chicken Gourmet Place’
address: Carrer Gran de Gràcia, 7, 08012 Barcelona, Spain

reviews_data.snippet: Our Chicken Gang loves La Pluma!!We eat here at least 2x a week and the quality is always great! :)Highlights: tomato salad and potato fries ❤️
Very nice and soulfuly made food.Tomato salad and half chicken with potatoes was very nice!Service speaks English and was very friendly:)

This is one if not the best roast chicken you can get without asking your grandma to make it for you! It's juicy, tasty,crunchy on the skin. I quite like the mole sauce, although might not be for everyone's taste.They do take away and eat in although I haven't done it in this branch.Note: on weekend you should call the day before to book in advance unless disappointment will happen.

The Chicken Experience that you never tasted before.Redefine the notion of chicken.Absolutely amazing, full of taste and delicious.There no other words to add. You HAVE to taste this place.Plus, the waiters are really lovely and nice.The place is amazing.And they accept tickets restaurant.What else?
Fried chicken very good. Very big portions, I ate it alone but it could easily go for two people
Great service with a smile,they explain the dishes and the origin of the food. Delicious food !
Tasty chicken, delicious croquettes, spectacular sauces. It's always quite full.
Frankly, one of the best chicken I ever had - Pollo frito (fried chicken) or chicken curry are my favourites. Fries are sometimes too soft though. Nice outdoor seating
In some way I prefer the first place although it is more small. The chicken is as usually very juice and tasty, the atmosphere is nice.
Tried a number of things on the menu between our group. Chicken croquetes, roast chicken, friend chicken. There's very few restaurants that specialise in chicken only. A Pluma do it very well.
Great food. Very nice staff.

Very hard to find good chicken in the city, this is one of the better ones. Has to reserve as always busy - which is a good sign Price-Quality is an issue. Starters, over priced - the tomatoes was covered in olive oil (very bad idea) and the grilled peppers are served which they don’t say beforehand - doesn’t fit in the menu. Chicken is good, the sauces are different to other places - but the waiter misinformed us of the weight of the chicken. Very small half chickens. The pineapple has potential to be a good dessert, but it needs to be grilled much longer and the mint taste removed as tastes artificial. A lot to improve, until then I won’t return - but this place is better than other “high priced” chicken places.

Just had lunch here today. I wish I could give it more stars! You get exactly what you ask for! Excellent chicken on a spit with intense chickeny flavour and potatoes that have been soaking in the gravy...mmm..The fried chicken was crispy and clearly fried in the moment so it was nice and fresh! The fries with the fried chicken are hand cut, not greasy and had the skins on (I love that) The sauces with the chicken....wow...the coconut curry sauce should be in a bottle and sold at the supermarket because they would make so much money out of it! It's so so good, really. Also, the kimchi mayo is very delicious. The service was really nice too and it isn't expensive. Will be back for sure! Well done guys! Next time I will try the tomato salad as it looked really nice.

response.snippet: Thank you so much for writing such a lovely comment! It motivate us to continue with the everyday hard work. We hope to see you soon!

reviews_data.snippet: Everything in this place is so full of taste! The tomato salad and the dessert of pineapple were the highlights for me. Every sort of chicken is really good and so were the croquettes! Better to reserve as it gets quickly full.

response.snippet: Thanks for your comment!

reviews_data.snippet: Tasty chicken, like in my country. Tender and Juicy.
If you like chicken this is the place to go! The menu does not offer anything else, but it's very much worth it! Melt in your mouth chickennnn
Never ever coming back!! It Is supposed to be a chicken place, however, the chicken we got was raw inside. It Is even Dangerous for one's health to eat raw chicken. What a disappointment.
Very delicious food...you gotta try the pineapple!
KFC in different way
Very good and fast service.The chicken was juicy and tender.Sauces good. I would have liked a little more spice in the curry.The roast potatoes were the weak point. A little hard and very thin.
Very good and fast service.The rotisserie chicken was juicy and just right. Dads a bit tough.The curry sauce very good, I would have liked it with a bit more heat.

A group of young people run this fast food store and the chicken is the main one. They do it pretty well, they’re fast, even though it’s a little expensive. Good chicken and croquettes even better. Maybe we'll try more!

Excellent gastronomic proposal with chicken as the protagonist. Delicious croquettes, fried chicken strips and hamburgers. The fries are accompanied with Japanese mayonnaise and they are really good. Special mention is made of the simple but delicious tomato salad. We will return for the chicken a l'ast and to enjoy the attention of the waitresses, very professional and pleasant. Totally recommended.

The best chicken a l'ast I have eaten in Barcelona. It is a pleasure that you arrive at a place where they do not know you, that it is full but that they make room for you to eat quickly, that is called professionalism.Seeing Greta move (I asked her for her name to publish it) between the tables and organizing is a spectacle.Thanks for your attitude.
Incredible a different species unbeatable service very helpful waiters and speaking different languages
Una manera algo diferente de comer pollo. Nos encantó y a las niñas también. Pedimos la salsa picante a parte y ningún problema. La chica que nos atendió fue encantadora.
We ordered and took away a chicken with potatoes - great! Very kind staff spoke English or Italian! All anti Covid-19 rules respected.

We went to pick up our order and were queuing waiting our turn to be attended to. Suddenly, an old man slipped in and we politely told him we were queuing up waiting for our turn. To this, he replied that he was in charge and we answered that too. All offended, he replied: "good good apart, I'm the owner." We replied that we liked it very much but that we were also waiting. After this answer, the gentleman continued to comment with sarcasm and irony towards us. We have always had a very good experience with A Pluma in terms of its service and the quality of the food but we find it unfortunate that someone who calls himself "the owner" treats his customers like that.

Great value for money. The cover usually costs us 13-16 euros, something rare in Barcelona. The best without a doubt is the grilled chicken, they serve you a good amount and it is spectacular. Pineapple is highly recommended for dessert, it is served with a lime syrup and a kind of grained sugar. Healthy and well priced, you can't ask for more.

The opinion of the 5 people who have eaten the order:Chicken, croquettes, potatoesWe agree that we liked the croquettes.The chicken and potatoes have totally disappointed us (used to eating chicken a l 'ast and from different places): we have found this one between a raw and at the same time dry, without a marked or defined flavor, bland.We will not repeat, the staging of the premises implies much more than what it offers, the price if it were an innovative product, different, positive, nothing to say, but it is not ...

I really wanted to visit this place, I was very excited to see the authentic chicken alast with one of the two sauces that for me are one of the best; Mole Poblano and massaman curry. The eggplant also had miso sauce. You automatically realize that there is a combination of cultures and knowledge. The chicken was soft and mellow and the croquettes were wonderful as well as the corn on the cob, it was like eating popcorn it had an unbeatable flavor do yourself a favor and visit the restaurant ... it may be that people find increases in costs but there really is a knowledge and quality, the attention was very good we will return to try the burger.

response.snippet: (Translated by Google) Thank you very much Juan Pablo for this endearing review, we are very excited to know that our customers enjoy our proposal. On behalf of the entire team, thank you for taking the time to write a comment!(Original)Muchas gracias Juan Pablo por esta reseña tan entrañable, nos hace mucha ilusión saber que nuestros clientes disfrutan con nuestra propuesta. De parte de todo el equipo agradecerte que te hayas tomado el tiempo en escribir un comentario!

reviews_data.snippet: Ideal for a quick lunch. I don't know which is better, if the tomato, the aubergine with miso, the chicken in sauces (red curry or mole) or ... the pineapple! What a pineapple! #friedchicken

response.snippet: (Translated by Google) Thank you very much for your visit! We are very excited to know that you enjoy in our restaurant!(Original)Muchas gracias por tu visita! Nos hace mucha ilusión saber que disrutas en nuestro restaurante!

reviews_data.snippet: Everything is excellent! From the aubergine with miso sauce that we ordered as a starter that has a smoky flavor that goes through a sweet taste and slight acid touches to the chicken curry that is a delight and with just the right touch of spice.Going to the bathroom is quite a cultural walk, I thought the exhibition of very peculiar paintings that they have was great. The attention is very good and they are attentive to all the details all the time. We will be back and without a doubt a restaurant to take friends and family to meet!

The waiting time with reservation and order paid was 15min and 2min in 2 days. They seem to prioritize riders and equalize people without reservation. If despite having to pay and book you have to be in line, or wait when there aren’t any, it’s not a * premium * experience as they claim to be.
Everything perfect, the chicken, the croquettes, the sauces ... the attention and speed of the service. Totally recommendable.
Different flavor I likedKindness 👍Salu2
Local well decorated and used.The right and kind attention.Tomato salad very good.Fried chicken very well, served in cones and with fries (rich).Mayonnaise with kimchi recommended.

reviews_data.snippet: I went for the pineapple and it was what I liked the most, the super rich chicken and the potatoes too. But if you go you have to ask for the pineapple and guess its ingredients.

reviews_data.snippet: El pollo está fantástico, sabor muy bueno, el canelón delicioso también, el único pero a mi gusto era que tenía mucha bechamel, la atención es maravillosa, muy amables, regresaré a probar más del menú sin duda.

Today we have ordered to take away 1 whole chicken, fried chicken and croquettes, we have done it on the web.The attention when arriving to the order very well, everything is very well organized.The chicken was very good and juicy, including the breasts. The potatoes, both roasted and fried, very good. The fried chicken and the hash browns were also very good. The sauces, allioli and kimchi a good complement.

reviews_data.snippet: Great chicken and the attention received 😉.Recommendation call to reserve.
Excellent food.Unbeatable value for money (5 chicken croquettes € 7, but they are very worth it)The staff is fast and very attentive and friendly.
Chicken croquettes and roasted chicken variations are delicious. There is also a kind of eggplant miso dengaku, and it is suitable for Japanese people.
Excellent quality and service. Highly recommended.
Delicious! The best place to eat chicken! Magali attended us and the service was incredible, the atmosphere was very pleasant.

Simple dishes of roast chicken, but the simple thing they do well. Chicken for nothing dry (which is common in roast chicken), made with charcoal, and with the possibility of accompanying it with two sauces, which are quite good. The croquette is exceptional, a rich bechamel wrapped in a thin batter. Potatoes also very good.

reviews_data.snippet: The site is small and needs a reservation because they are full. The great food and especially that intense red tomato as its flavor .. To repeat ...
A tasty roast chicken with varied sauces, in a good atmosphere and very attentive waiters.

reviews_data.snippet: 100% recommended, the chicken is fine, but the croquettes and the cannelloni spectacular! Very good attention

Insuperable! It is the home of baked chicken. Nice and simple place with a very attentive service. The must of the letter is really all ☺️. The spectacular tomato salad, miso eggplant is great. Delicious croquettes, fried chicken slightly spicy very rich. The spicy wings are spectacular. Baked chicken definitely the best. The cannelloni with bechamel is very rich.The wine selection a 10Desserts without mandatoryThis is the first time I go, this time we were attended by 9. Experience 10, we return for sure

reviews_data.snippet: We ordered from the web. Apparently they don’t coordinate it well enough because they didn’t have much record of it and I guess that’s why I had to wait a while to pick it up. Also, I had ordered fried chicken for my little son but they put it spicy and he couldn’t eat it, of course. For all this, my recommendation is not to order through the web.On the other hand, chicken is nothing out of this world. In fact, it is rather dry. The fried one, on the other hand, is good enough as well as the french fries and sauces to accompany which I would highlight the garlic-and-oil and the curry.I don’t think we repeat. I will not advertise other houses but for this price there are much better ones.
The chicken is very good. All right

The best chickens that I have eaten, and I have eaten many, tasty, juicy, it was a delivery service, the wep gives you many options and the delivery service was very punctual and very correct. One hundred percent recommended.
I did not like it !!! All lies, the chicken is not wood-fired !!! It is no wonder ... quality very low price !!!

I had wanted to visit this site for a long time.We ordered to take a chicken and some chicken nuggets.The brutal chicken is served with potatoes that capture all the flavor of the very good chicken.The creamy croquettes, excellent.No complaint, I'll be back to try new things.

title: Nobu Hotel Barcelona
description: Upscale hotel with hip Japanese dining. Chic quarters in a posh hotel offering a trendy Japanese restaurant & a tapas bar.

reviews_data.snippet: I stayed here in July 2015. It was called as Gran Hotel Torre. I had a pleasant stay and I liked the room so much. Room was clean and spacious.

Pretty expensive but one of the best views in Barcelona and definitely the best tuna sashimi I tried in Barcelona.Rest of the food was decent but price quality is 7/10.Service is great. Higher then most places in Barcelona. Up to international standard.Andrea was professional, well done!Hostess were super friendly and helpful 👍
Everything you expect from Nobu. An upscale, well thought out marriage of Japanese naturalism/minimalism + local design sense. Wonderful.
The staff was very helpful until on the 4th day they recommended me to a bike rent of their choice and helped them rip me 100 Euros..I regret staying at this hotel and trusting their staff

Exquisite setting and hospitality and a team that is dedicated to please their customers and always available! A solid 5*. Highly recommended for the carefully decorated rooms, great restaurant, healthy breakfast options and quirky cocktails!
The best Japanese foods in town with stunning city view....

Friendly staff, convenient location, super view! But: the check-in took 25min although it was already pre booked and paid in advance. Checkout took 13min. The security deposit was €150 per day, which we never experienced before. Blocking €600 for 4 nights for an already prepaid room is not understandable and leaves a strange feeling of no trust in their guests.As the hotel just opened recently not all rooms/floors or part of the hotel (spa) were ready yet. Guessing they booked most of the guests in the same floors/rooms, it was already "dirty" (floors were not cleaned e.g. urinal rests on toilet floor, towel was stained etc) we rather enjoy dinners at Nobus' internationally but will rather not come back to this hotel

Spectacular in every way. Highlighting first of all the attention of all the staff and the kind treatment received at all times, always willing to what you need, is something that seems obvious that it must be so but in many good hotels it does not happen. The hotel has a minimalist Japanese design but with all the amenities you may need. The beds are very comfortable in which rest is guaranteed. Everything is thought that the client is comfortable during their stay. Both the lights and the curtains work with buttons, which at first cost me a little to understand the operation, but with a little trial everything is solved. Finally the food, who has been in a Nobu restaurant knows what is hidden behind, the product is unbeatable and the production is incredible. The sushi bar is second to none if you don't go to Japan. The room service is also very good. For breakfast I would recommend the eggs Benedict. I forgot to highlight the incredible views of Barcelona and the good existing communications being located next to the Sants station. A place to repeat every time you return to Barcelona.

I had high expectations but the night was disappointing me. We arrived about 40 minutes before and, of course, we were having a drink at the bar until the time of our reservation, so far.They took us to our table 15 minutes late despite the table being ready, and we were frankly very cold but we thought it would be just waiting, our surprise came when we sat down to double cold. Horrible!All the tables of two commented on the cold and we repeatedly asked that he will finally graduate almost in the desserts turned it off.A shame not to enjoy a dinner of € 200 for the cold, but this was not the only thing the very attentive waiter recommended several dishes and asked us about something we did not want.Kindly tell you not to chop much and especially that nothing carried onion or chives, obviously as attached in the photos he wrote down but kitchen made great mistakes.Finally we had to wait longer than desired for both coffees and for the account. It is understood that nothing can be perfect in an inauguration but to be disgusted by the climate of Alaska and that they do not meet the basic ones that are requested, disappointing.

reviews_data.snippet: If you miss home, eat here! Visited the first day we arrived in Barcelona from the States. A local recommended this place. I imagined a turo-turo joint. Went with my gut and order kare-kare while my partner got the Litsilog and a steaming bowl of pork sinigang. OMG, the bagoong that came with my kare-kare is to die for. Finished with a fresh halo-halo on this hottttt June night in the Raval barrio. Ang sarap!

I love authentic restaurants, without costumes or fusions. This is one of them. Authentic Filipino food and a very varied menu. Salads, greaves, soups, suckling pig, pork in all its variants and Filipino desserts. The atmosphere is that of the Philippine community here in Barcelona. The treatment is very kind. The place is a dining room with about ten tables, something simple and familiar. We will repeat!

Super rich and cheap food! It is a discovery and I save it for many more occasions. I have tried new things and I loved all the dishes that the waiter recommended. reviews_data.snippet: This restaurant has been recommended to me by a Filipino lady, who leads a team of 5 chefs and 3 helpers, also her countrymen, who work in the home of a very influential family in Barcelona. The wait has been almost 30 minutes long, but it is understandable that the restaurant was very crowded at 14.00 rush hour. I was very surprised that nobody complained, they waited patiently for them to be served, families with children, couples, workers, tourists. Suddenly the food began to come out completing tables. There are no words to describe how immensely good and how well presented the dish was. Well yes very very very good.A quality and an incredible price, it is worth moving from the opposite point of Barcelona or coming from far away expressly, because it does not disappoint and leaves no one indifferent. Restaurants in Barcelona are raffled to Filipino chefs, they sign chefs from the Asian country for their expertise in preparing classic and modern dishes of Spanish cuisine.They are reputed to be honest, reliable, hardworking and above all to know how to trace the recipes with extreme precision. I will discover and try more dishes and especially their typical Halo Halo star dessert.
Good food, good price and a correct treatment, I will return

reviews_data.snippet: We have a Cuban family, we know gastronomy and we went to discover and recall sensations. The food tastes like Cuba, maybe they are not the flavors that you would find in a Cuban house, but more or less, they are Cuban recipes. The Yuca with Cuban mojo makes it too dry and with very little mojo, it would not be bad to let it boil a little more and be more generous with the Cuban mojo.In relation to prices, the ingredients of Cuban dishes are very basic and nowadays easy to find. € 8 for a piece of boiled yucca seems excessive to me, and € 7 for a plate of cooked white rice, another excess. If it is for the prices, I would not repeat.

title: Xup Xup Restaurant
address: Passeig Marítim de la Barceloneta, s/n, 08003 Barcelona, Spain
description: Paella & creative tapas by the water. Stylishly plated seafood & meat paellas, plus tapas & wine, in a glass-fronted space with sea views.

reviews_data.snippet: It was a shame we couldn't order the paella (not clear why). Other than that it was very good, we enjoyed the food (in particular the desserts), a very nice view right by the beach and friendly waiters. Also for a beach bar we found the prices were lower than we would have expected. Overall a lovely experience!

response.snippet: Hello L. E.,Thank you very much for commenting on your experience at XupXup Restaurant. We will talk to our team to find out what happened to the paella, we hope to see you again!Greetings,Grup Arenal,

reviews_data.snippet: One of the best tuna tartare I’ve had in a while, and I always order it when I see it. It’s nothing too fancy, but it was tasty and big portion for the price. Their other potions looked huge and delicious as well. Def recommend eating here as you listen to the waves.UPDATE: they just brought out a free 1/2 pitcher of sangria bc they were getting rid of it for the night. They know how to take care of their customers!

This was one of my favorite places we ate during our week stay. We ordered 3 tapas and each was delicious. The location is right along the beach and has a beautiful view of the sea. Drinks are delicious too. Highly recommend.

We got the paella and they tasted amazing. Sangrias by the sea, and we were happy to find out that they stayed open later than other restaurants by the sea. The shore is on the quiet side on the beach away from drunk and loud people.

response.snippet: Hello Gianmarco Nuvoli,We are sorry that you had such an impression of our restaurant.  The truth is that due to the actual Spanish COVID restrictions no one can enter restaurants and bars after 5 pm, no matter how friendly are the people who request it.  Just to clarify, perhaps you did not understand us when we explained that the coffee machine was already cleaned and turned off, not damaged.  On the other hand, in general we receive and value opinions from customers who have been eating and consuming in our restaurant, not from passers-by in groups who only want to go to the bathroom outside the permitted hours. Despite that it is incorrect to duplicate comments, this “local guide” is very unreliable, since Gian Marco Nuvoli is the same person as Gianmarco Nuvoli.Grup Arenal

reviews_data.snippet: As a couple we ordered some small sharers which consisted of two types of ham, some potatoes and some shrimp. Add a sangria and a small slice of cheesecake to share and you've got yourself a bill for €104. A few small pieces of one particular ham was €30. They even hid the menu so we couldnt argue. Add on top of that terrible service which they feel they can charge you 10% for and it is also worth mentioning that everything had a surcharge for sitting outside even though we wanted to sit inside but there was no space because it was too cold and raining. Something they neglected to mention to us. Effectively you've got yourself a rip off restaurant prying on unsuspecting tourists. Avoid!

title: Paco Meralgo
description: Lively, modern tapas restaurant. Cozy tapas bar with a buzzy vibe & stool seating, serving seafood plates, croquettes & tartare.

reviews_data.snippet: Good service, friendly staff and excellent tapas. Slightly on the pricey side for quality and nice set up. Enjoyed my lunch very much

Good food, overpriced. It has a Michelin star from 2018. Not impressed and a little satisfied. I felt pushed and hurried. The bathroom was a mess and full of flies which were coming towards the bar area and bothering people.
Amazing food!!!Great service ✌🏻So simple and so tasty
Wonderfully tasty food! Great service and very fun atmosphere. Highly recommended

This is the Place! They have the best tapas ever! The freshness of the product, the accuracy of the preparation, the quality of the service and the atmosphere. Unbelievable! For me it’s the best tapa place in Barcelona! A must go to!
Great tapas place, great choice of fresh seafood and beautiful selection of wines by glass

Food is good, not extraordinary. A bit too salty. The mille-feuille was a bit burned. Restaurant looking ok-ish, dirty toilettes, there were flies flying towards the bar area disturbing people who were eating. Restaurant is overpriced.
One of the best and traditional tapas place in BCN. A bit expensive by local standard, especially if you go with a smaller party. It gets much better when you are in a big group.
Delicious food, the service was amazing, the croquetes truly memorable! One of my favorite places in Barcelona.
One of my favourite spots in Barcelona - excellent food and very good service. A must try for both locals and tourists.

The quality of the food was impeccable! There is nothing bad about his place. We were 5 people and we ordered several dishes to share and as they kept coming they kept getting better! The oysters were very good, tasteful and fresh, same as all the fish and seafood: tuna tataki, salmon tartare, scallops, razor clams , cod fritters... all combined with exquisite white wine. The service was good, he was helpful and professional, and he made his best to speak a good English to communicate.The ambience and the decoration as perfect!We will go back for sure!
A good example of the great quality food in Barcelona.
Such a great tapas place.They are also very quick, the 2h slot is way more than enough for a full dinner with desert and 3 rounds of tapas
Great seafood tapas and nice wine!
Everything was so tasty that I forgot to take more fotos ☺️

I’ve never felt unsafe in a restaurant until I dined here. The waiters (in particular the bald guy with the hoop earring) were hostile and petulant. Hearing them refer to us as “gringos” to the kitchen staff made my heart sink. I really hope the staff take a moment to reflect and realize that their job isn’t just to get food and drinks to the table, it’s to make paying customers feel safe and welcome. This was a horrible evening: please do better, please be kind.
A must go to in Barcelona. Very high-quality tapas and a toro to absolutely die for. The staff is also super attentive and nice!
Nice staff and service for this local taverna , serving good fresh tapas. Prices are a bit high though.
Top quality, but don’t hesitate if you don’t mind the high prices. Pictured - Bombas and Bravas.
local restaurant friend recommended this place. Food quality is higher and more delicate than other lower priced Tapas place. If you are looking for good food, visit here. Definitely come back again!
Great! Listened locals’ recommendation and very happy with it!
Super food! Very good option for snacks, don't need of the main course! All we tried was fresh and very tasty! Recommend.

Great restaurant, but priced to match.Brilliant seafood dishes all around, everything we had was great, and cooked perfectly. Service was a bit slow, but we did go towards the end of service so not a big problem.The only reason I wouldn't give the restaurant 5 stars is price. It's not overpriced, but equally it's not cheap either. So while the quality is great, it's quite pricey. We had similar (or better) seafood in Barcelona at lower prices.

Amazing food and service✨Every single food ordered was delicious and I always craved more after!Try the Tuna Carpaccio, pepper steak, bread with tomato, garlic prawns, melted Brie on bread, and for dessert Catalan custard.Definitely coming back here next time I’m in Barcelona.

Just moved to Barcelona and decided to go here as a celebration dinner. The food was delicious! We ordered several items based on some of the suggestions from our server and what we were feeing. All of them were really good and we look forward to our next meal here.They do get quite busy so getting a reservation is encouraged.
Nice food and very attentive and kind service.

Excellent service and food both in taste and presentation. Our waiter Elio was extremely competent helpful with great knowledge. He gave us the greatest of suggestions and describing the food perfectly! A huge thank you Elio!
Great tapas place!!! Fantastic food... different... creative and generally awesome... we had lunch here and utterly loved it! Good service and great food! Will be repeated! 😀

Made a reservation for dinner on a weekday , and glad that we decided to do so as the place was soon filled after we've arrived. Was able to grab seats at the bar area, and witnessed the maître d/bartenders/kitchen in action. Was completely satisfied with everything we ordered EXCEPT the calamari.

We had a delicious meal. The waiter, Viktor, gave good recommendations. Everything we ordered was spot on. Fresh tuna, sepia croquettes and beef solomillo. For desert we got the tiramisu. It was uniquely served and really good! Make sure you reserve in advance.

A great tapas place in the center of Barcelona. A variety of sea food, fish, meat and vegetables Tapas. All fresh and tasty. The prices are higher than other tapas places and so is the quality. A friendly advice - come at 8 o’clock sharp otherwise you’ll have to wait for quite a long time.
Always so good,one of my favourite restaurant in Barcelona

Good service and food quality, but overall price/quality ratio is pretty low by Barcelona standards. I went recently as a recommendation, and I had the feeling that it was more like a tourist destination, fueled by the power of good social marketing and hype. Not on my list to revisit.
Excellent food always. One of the best seafood restaurants in town.Expensive - a little. Worth it? Yes.Would I go again? Absolutely.

Quality of the food, specially the seafood!! OMG yes do go there. Waiters seem to be always in a hurry even if the restaurant is not full.Patatas bravisimas are not that good honestly but order seafood!!

Really amazing top notch tapas bar in Eixample! Went here for lunch during a business trip to Barcelona and have not been disappointed by the many recommendations I have gotten prior to my visit. The food is absolutely delicious and fresh, the staff super friendly and helpful with the menu and above all a really cool looking cozy space! Keep up the good vibe and make sure to visit this place!

Of many of the tapas places we went in Barcelona we loved this place. Service, food, and ambience were all EXCELLENT. All the tapas were great, especially the croquetas. The only negative thing is that we order gambas (market price) and they were remarkably expensive compared to the other dishes relative to their size (they were quite small).

This restaurant was recommended to me by a dear friend, and after eating here, I would definitely recommend it too! Quality food that fuses traditional with modernist Spanish cuisine. The restaurant itself is beautiful, the food is delicious and the service was top notch! I would like to make special mention of the cuttlefish croquette! Wow!

Visited during lunch for tapas and couldn’t have been happier. Food was great, service was top notch. They have a large tapas menu as well as a large wine list. We took our 2 younger kids and they got us a spot upstairs out of the way and a place to park the stroller. Would definitely return.

Another of our must-visit over the 5 or so vacations in Spain. Never disappointed. 🤞 Reservations strongly recommended. Seats by the counter are on a 1st-come-1st-served basis, in case it's fully booked and you wanna try your luck. Enjoy! 😋
Tapas and atmosphere really good! The second plate was OK. We thought the prices were pretty high, that’s why 4 stars. Next time we choose only for tapas

Recommended to come here by some friends while visiting Barcelona. Food was so delicious and different from any other Tapas style restaurant we had been too. Ask for recommendations from the server and trust it will be delicious!
It was simply very good!Good service good food good wine good mood good chocolate ganage...
Great food. A bit uneven service effort. Highly recommended nonetheless!

What an experience - if you up for some high end, perfectly cooked tapas - head here. Yes, they have an English Menue and yes it is full of locals that speak Spanish, and if you have no reservation and you are not spot on 8 pm here when they open - know that you have to queue and wait for 40min. It’s worth it. So reserve a Table or - as we did - come sharp 8 pm and sit at the bar (which is for us the best place anyhow). Indulge the food! Best for us: the tuna salad, the Tatar of salmon and the tartar of sea bass - a dream comes true.

We kind of stumble upon this place and was lucky to get a seat as they had just opened. What luck! It turned out to be one of the best tapas we've eaten in Barcelona. Fresh and simple yet so flavorful. Myriad of taste with each dish! If you're not as lucky as us, please do make a reservation! You wont regret it :)

superrrrr delicious, everything we ordered was a hit, highly recommended. try to come early , it gets busier around 7pm ish, so try to come around 6 630 to get a table. also dont forget to order sangria when u here
Favorite place in Barcelona
Nice service and nice tapas we enjoyed everything. We did not take the "patatas bravas" because we knew that they are really spicy. Desserts where delicious! We will definitely repeat.

Wow— artistry at work. every dish made with care, and i mean everything from the main ingredients to the accompanying crisps and breads. The service was very professional, timing everything perfectly and remaining friendly although the place was jam-packed.we tried twice to make a reservation— apparently you need about a week‘s notice for that. Our alternative was to get there ten minutes before opening time and get a spot at the bar. anyone after us had to wait at least half an hour to get in. It was so worth it, and next time we‘re in Barcelona, we‘ll call a week or two ahead of time ;-)

Very good food, very good wine. Had the croquetas, the meat balls and the grilled monkfish. Was good. But really excellent was the bread as starter and the postre ‘montadito de madagascar’. Can completely recommend it.

Along with Vinitus this is one of our favorite tapas restaurant in Barcelona. The crowd is a mix of locals and tourists but the feel is authentic, the decor is warm and the service is very friendly. We enjoyed just about every plate including the desserts but some of our favorites included the prawns and the oxtail stew. If you're alone or in a small group try to grab a seat at the bar. Reservations are highly recommended to avoid a wait and can be made by Grup Olive's mobile app.
Just the Best! Great lively atmosphere and excellent tapas. Every time we come to Barcelona we eat here at least once.
Awesome typical catalan food. Nice place to go with family and friends
Love love love this place. Authentic classy tapas, friendly service. Good wine too.

The food here is incredibly good, very good prices for high quality food, one of my faves in Barcelona. Cuttlefish dish was great! Was exciting for the next set of plates to come in each time. Recommend to book before going as it can be very busy.

Very good tapa's restaurant. I was lucky to arrive just before it got really busy, so I recommend booking if you won't like waiting. The food had very good quality, the price is higher than standard in Barcelona. The staff is very nice and the environment is friendly. I recommend having the patata's bravas and the tiramisu for dessert.
Excellent food. Excellen atmosphere. Very friendly staff.

Not the classic tapas bar in Barcelona. Fantastic fresh fish (the gambas omg) and some typical tapas revised. The team is very warm and the restaurant is well positioned in the eixample district. Menu available also in English.

Went for lunch her on Saturday.... quality is very good also the taste! Our waiters were very friendly when they found out I can speak some spanish...It’s at nights very crowded - dishes are delicious and I would say the price is more than ok.... totally can recommend it!!!
Amazing tapas and the chardonnay was on point. The place was so good that we had to make a couple more trips before we left!
Great tapas, staff is super friendly - don't miss the Catalan french toast
So delicious, just fantastic, i am a food traveler and this place was awesome!
Decent! Would be good if not for the price. Expensive for what it is
Great tapas place, amazing food and atmosphere. Hope to come again soon.

Perfect quality food. Fresh. You have to wait a bit if you haven’t booked a table. Take a glass of wine and enjoy , the food will make your mouth happy.Thé créma catalans is delicious. I don’t know what they add, lemon or bergamot? But is heaven
One of the best Tapas-Bistro spots in Barcelona, its a great place to ask for a different amount of modern Tapas with a mix of classic flavors. Try the Gambas al Ajillo, 5 stars right there.
Amazing high quality tapas place. Highly recommended. Reserve a table with enough time as it’s always packed!

Fantastic food and tapas. The best in town in the heart of Barcelona close to the Martini Club. If you are alone stay in the “barra” if you are more choose a table. In both you need a reservation for sure. In this night, I ate Bacalao, Croquetas Obama, Gambas al Ajillo and a tempura or greens. As desert I ate a Milfeulie and a cafe solo. Just try it do not think to much! Enjoy life!

A chic tapas restaurant in the heart of Barcelona. Higher prices matching the quality of the food served. Savory-dishes wise, I recommend the salmon tartar and the foie. Both are excellent: the salmon is one of the best I’ve ever tasted. It’s rich texture as well as the rice layer under it and the sauce are a match made in heaven. Same for the foie, which is medium-to-well cooked. The purée on the side was just correct, and the figs combined with the crunchy bread are on-point. Dessert wise: the crema catalana was also well done, the burn just right, and the biscuit crunchy but not too think, so you taste the best of both worlds. Servers are excellent and always smiling, and they didn’t hesitate to change two of our plates twice as I’m allergic to garlic. They also accomodated us as soon as we got in. I omit one star as there was a bit of waiting time between the dishes.

I enjoy tapas because it is somehow like a set menu in the fact that you try several courses; the anticipation of what the next platter holds is exciting. When we arrived, we were told that since we had no reservation we had to sit at the bar instead of a regular table. It turns out that the bar seating was closer to the source; where all the action happens. I ordered a gazpacho as my drink and it was really flavorful. Embracing the red fruit, commonly known as a vegetable, we then ate the famous simple traditional Spanish dish: tomato bread. One of the tapas had all eyes on me, literally. I loved the breaded shrimps but this was one shrimp tapa I could not bear to maintain eye contact with. Finally, the Crema Catalana was the something sweet I decided to eat; pardon the rhyming. Unfortunately, the sweetness was masked by a sort of mixture of gasoline-like and something burnt taste. This is most probably due to the blow torch used to caramelize the sugar, except that the result was more burnt than caramel; Salted Caramel doesn’t appreciate being burnt.
Best hospitality in Pamplona. Friendly and helpful staff and delicious tapas!!

Great restaurant for tapas.. nice environment- classy and cosy.. friendly and forthcoming staffs- speak English and v helpful. Lots of ppl.. do go early or make reservation. I got bar seat. Tapas are good.. many varieties and cooked to perfection and fresh. Quite pricy comparing to other tapas restaurants that I've tried. Highly recommended... 👍😋🇪🇸🍽
Excellent Service! Great see food tapas, great selection of tapas (sea food, meat and veggies). Really 5 stars.

Easily makes my list of places never to go back to. Mediocre food, overpriced, forgot to bring main dish, no day menu, and does not accept Restaurant cards even though we were told they do. The courgettes with mozarella were good though.

Very flavorful food with an incredibly efficient staff. I like how they make some clear recommendations on food choices and that the vibe is both casual and formal. Recommend the beef slices and the patatas bravas. We didn't get much seafood but that seems to be a popular choice among the restaurant goers.

We went to this classy tapas bar for lunch. There was a bit of a wait because the place was so busy (with tourists and locals). My only slight complaint would be the lack of seating when you are waiting.The picture below was just the first orders! Everything came together and service was super quick. The staff also spoke English and were very helpful. The food was amazing. Highlights were the pan tumaca, peppers and the fried anchovies (not pictured). There was loads of other stuff on the menu that I wanted to try too but we were all stuffed! The atmosphere was really nice and I would highly recommend.
Wide selection of excellent and very fresh tapas, buzzing atmosphere, good service and fair price. Definitely recommend to go here.

Good place. A bit pricier than other places. Expect to pay about 40 per head with wine. Good selection. Friendly staff. Very busy at dinner. Will come back. Try the bomba.2021 update. Still busy but more space sue to the distancing.Food still amazing. Still love the bomba
Excellent tapas, tried cured ham, green peppers croquettes, cheese sandwich, tuna salad, steak tartare and everything was great . Would definitely repeat.
Great place with excellent food and service.
Mandatory visit if you love Spanish tapas. Rabo de buey, zamburiñas and pan tumaca con jamón are highly recommended.
Outstanding. But get there early. Opens at 8pm, by 8:20 there were no tables left.
The best tapas ever

One of the best places we ate in Barcelona following a few mediocre and pricey excursions. The food here was really good quality, tasty and reasonably priced with friendly service. Highlights included the beef carpaccio with fois, croquettes Obama, ox tail on potato and the fried fish. We would definitely return
Scallops were very nice, service was top class.
Beautiful food, fantastic choice and worth a visit. Can't tell a lie did feel uncomfortable when I first arrived, however lovely the food is you still only cook food. Food brings people together 👌

You have to eat here. This is the best meal I have ever had in my entire life. I have traveled all over the world. I am surprised to discover the most amazing food in Barcelona. My waiter, John, made it the most amazing experience as well. His recommendations were phenomenal. Best shrimp, best bombas, best experience...EVER!
The food here is always wonderful
I’ve never eaten Tuna so goood like hear! It’s really worth to try.
Amazing tapas!!! Simply divine!! Definitely coming back soon!! Highly recommend
it was very good. kindly and delicious!

Would have given this place a 4.5 if it was an option because, the waitress was a little detached at times but was very friendly and helpful. In all honesty, this place was jammed packed with people the entire time we were there 2130-2300. Tapas was very good and the hazelnut ice cream was a pure delight. My partner had a delicious scallop which was cooked in a shell (pictured). We could definitely eat here again. If you can, I would suggest sitting at the bar.
The food was really good. Loved everything we ordered: the belotta ham, zucchini flowers, fresh anchovies, padron peppers, fresh seasonal mushrooms, and the most divine cod carpaccio!
Great tapas/ lovely vibe/ friendly service

I'm in disagreement with the 4.4 avg rating here on google. If I were to give an exact score, I would say closer to a 4.6-4.8 range.From my experience, I really enjoyed Pac Meralgo. I learned of this spot while enjoying some tapas at Morro Fi. A local there who is a chef in the area suggested we have to come here. He was absolutely right.Everything was excellent but the tartare was the highlight for me. Supple, great flavor (beware though, it does contain raw garlic), and the quail egg on top was the perfect finish to the dish. Most of the dishes are tapas style with simple flavors but since everything is so pure, they really let the food speak naturally without getting in the way. From the pictures below, we had a few dishes and they tasted better than they looked. Service was spot on with a modern decor with intimate seating. We were at the bar which is the best spot to be.After the fact, I read a review that said that they are on the Michelin list and they don't have a star but they deserve one.
Very very Gooooooood ;)
Amazing place, amazing food and amazing service! I recommend!
My all time favorite restaurant in Spain! A must visit in Barcelona. Love the cuttlefish croquette (omg the best all over Spain) and veal tartar with foie gras ❤️❤️❤️
Great food. İf you are not so good with fish. Order "bomba", vegatable tempura, tomato bread, artichoke.
Great service. Delicious tapas. Best bravas in all of BCN.
Really tasty food, to avoid lines you should come when they open! :)
Excellent place.
Very good tapas, the shrimps were delicious but €40 for 6 ;)
What a shame. Would have actually given this restaurant 4 stars if it wasn't for the pointless and offensive decision to name some black coloured croquettes after Obama. No place in the 21st century.
Traditional tapas done in the right way. Absolutely delicious!

My favourite restaurant in Barcelona. My tip is to get there and join the queue 15mins before opening. Only seats about 25-30 people, but dining speed and service means you won’t be waiting too long outside. Unless everyone else has the same idea! 😉Courgette Flowers and Steak are to die for!!

We enjoyed this place. Probably we were lucky to get seated pretty much right away. Place was packed and remained the same the whole time we had dinner. I've red some negative reviews and would understand the reason ,hypothetically. You're non Spanish speaking tourist (as we are) from USA were customers come first and sometimes it seams/feels you're ignored. We've got those feelings a couple of times during our trip to Spain. But hey, that's the beauty of getting an experience,even a bad one.Back to the place. Food was delicious. We noticed Michelin sign on the door later on..Im not acclaimed restaurant critic but do understand food. It was simple,very high quality,very tasty and... quick. I've attached a copy of our bill to show the perfect match of good food and very moderate price.
What I would call gourmet tapas! Absolutely delicious! Quite expensive but I believe worth it!
good tapas especially in love with the fresh sauce for the patatas

Came here on a Sunday night. Food was excellent, we had : croquettes (very good), Russian salad (filing and tasty), patas bravas (good but have had better), salmon tartare (very good) and oxtail (highly recommend!!). Atmosphere is casual, light and welcoming. Service was very good and fast! Would highly recommend. (It had a 4 star because a few things were sold out on the menu)
Beautiful experience, excellent quality of food with tradicional service.
Great stake! Must try. And the local french toast is just incredible
First night in Barcelona, came highly recommend and deservedly so. Food was great service was fantastic. Can’t wait to go back.
Great seafood tapas. Salmon tartar/ceviche was great and so was the monkfish. Had better octopuses though.

While in Barcelona we did our own tapas crawl and tried patatas bravas everywhere we went. THE BEST patatas bravas are here from what we tried. Instead of the red sauce they used an infused oil with the aioli. It was amazing. Light but flavorful. Have been dreaming of this place ever since!
good tapas
Great Taps Place! Top quality
Very good tapas👌🏻 super friendly service👌🏻 will go again for sure
Super delicious and very atmospheric place.Tataki de tuna is excellent!!!
amazing elevated tapas in barcelona

Great food amazing service, cannot recommend the prawns more. Like seriously, the best prawns I've ever had. If you go there and don't order at least 6 with your dinner you might as well not go at all!

We were in Barcelona for 20 days and this was the only place we came to twice. Nuff said! Make sure you get the pain de tomate which was the best we had which is a pretty strong statement since you practically eat this at evey meal! Everything on the menu was excellent and there wasn't an item that you would regret. And make sure you save space for the French Toast dessert! Last two pieces of advice make reservations or vome early and try and sit at the bar!
Amazing
Great food. Great quality, reasonable price. Everytime I come back is always great! Never disappoints.
Very good tapas for local people. Nice service
Just great
Delicious food and wine. Good service

Very nice tapas restaurant. The number of dishes are endless and the food is exquisite. There is a lovely atmosphere in the place and it really feels like the servers are happy to be there.Would recommend to anyone!
Very tasty and high quality food! Definitely recommended. The price per person would be from 30 to 50 per person depending on what you order
Great place with all the awesome tapas. The service was good. We enjoyed the food very much. This is now my favorite tapas place in Barcelona. Very highly recommended.

Arrived 8:15pm and the first thing the waiter does shows a long list dishes (most from the suggested menu) that are not available. The food that was available was delicious though. Great wine and atmosphere.
Wonderful restaurant. Excellent selection of food cooked to perfection. Friendly staff and marvelous atmosphere. I'd highly recommend dining here to anyone.

This is a great restaurant. By mistake we and two friends from the US arrived two hours earlier than our reservation time to find the restaurant filled to capacity and then some. The host graciously put us at an upstairs table typically reserved for private dining and our server attended to everything in an incredibly friendly manner even though we were making him walk up and down stairs with each order. The food also was terrific - we had an array of traditional Catalan dishes and were able to tell our friends that they were authentic based on our experience. I'd highly recommend going to Paco Meralgo.

I was recommended to try this place before I left Ireland for Barcelona and I could not have been happier with the result. The food was astounding, recommend booking online to get a good seat. Was really wowed by every dish (we shared a total of 6 between two people plus desserts)One of the best restaurant experiences I've ever had.Edit : just have to add that we really enjoyed the service there, it was very genuine and not over the top, we felt very at home and welcome despite not having any Spanish. Our waiter also made a very funny gag that I won't spoil in case it's a regular trick of his, but had us in stitches!

Great seafood restaurant. The staff are very welcoming, and get very excited for any tips (loudly thank the tipper).The food is good, I have no complaints. Recommend taking many dishes and sharing all of them.
Very good food. Recommend the raw fish. Pretty expensive though. 80 euros for two ... professional place. Toilet is the only place that wasnt perfectly clean. But almost.

Definitely a place you HAVE to visit and eat at if you are in Barcelona. The food is delicious and the waiters are awesome! They can start a conversation and serve great food! Truly one of the best Tapas places in Barcelona! Here are all the pics!
Great tapas

Great staff and exceptionally tasty food! Extremely recomend: Steak taratar, Salmon soja, Patatas bravisimas, Berberechos and to finish the Mango Mousse. At least going there once a month for years now :-) D

Energetic place that is always full, over a couple of years that I know. Attentive staff that is dressed in a nice uniform, efficient service and several seating areas. It can be a casual meal but you can have a date or business dinner too. Reasonably priced tasty dishes.

This restaurant is probably the best tapas place that I have been to! Very much seafood based but delicious!! I recommend the fish croquettes they are sooo good!! It is advisable to book a table in advance but you can also wait to eat at the bar otherwise. The food comes out very quickly too. The staff is also super friendly and funny. Can only recommend!!!
the first time I had no luck to eat, because I had to wait 40 min, of course I had no reservation, but the second time I returned again and tried the delicious food in Paco Meralgo. I recommend 100%.
It's our ritual. We can't visit Barcelona without eating here. So so so good. So tasty. Attentive people despite the busyness.

Finding a good restaurant on a Sunday night is always a challenge. This Sunday struck gold with this little place.On first sight, the bright by lighting and high tables might put you off as it looks a bit sterile from outside. However, step through the door and be welcomed by friendly and attentive bunch of waiters. We were given some excellent recommendations and enjoyed some creative and inspired tapas.

Eager to experience tapas in Barcelona, I booked this restaurant because of its good ratings and relatively cheaper prices. We ordered about 6 items for dinner and 2 for dessert. The menu had lots of variety and we just ordered what looked good to us, ranging from sea snails to oxtail. We loved it all! Tried dishes that were different from what we would normally be tempted to order and were very impressed. The service was fast and friendly to contribute to an overall splendid time!
Highly recommended ! Good quality , good staff and nice location ! Thank you 😊
Very popular high end tapas restaurant catering to locals as well as tourists. The razor clams were incredible, as well as the Catalan style French Toast. I have been dropping by every visit to Bcn!

A Barcelona classic. Come here for the super fresh fish and seafood and stay for the lively and upscale crowd. Lots of seating and no reservations at high chairs enable acceptable wait (15-20min) even at dinner time. Food is exquisite quality and traditional with a twist. Skip deserts and have them somewhere else.

Great food! No matter what plate you order you can't go wrong, great service as well although you do feel they're in a rush but if you have questions they'll take the time to answer them and make recommendations. Been to Barcelona a lot of times and never knew this place existed, now it is in on my top list.

Great restaurant for dinner. Stylish and wont let you down if you invite your partner (or datenight :) portions are HUGE. Could feed even 2 persons one of them. Around 20e per person and worth every penny. SUPER SATISFIED.

An exciting ecuatorian place close to Sagrada Familia.El Ñaño offers a huge variety of dishes, including fish (ceviche), meat, chicken and pork.Fresh patacones with cheese and tasty lemonades.Fantastic atmosphere with a couple of funny guys playing music.100% recommended.
Delicious meals, insanely huge portions, reasonable prices and very quick service! It was an awesome experience.

I have no idea how authentic this is, but it was delicious and wow the portions were huge! My husband had an amazing sandwich de chanco & I had the chaulafan. We definitely could have split both. Red sangria was very yummy. We were also surprised by the pico de Gallo looking side, which was tasty and had a great spice level. It had a kick. There was also lovely live music, which was surprising too.

This is an amazing place to eat and enjoy real good food and differents tastes from latin america. Exactly tradicitional dishes from ecuador with low cost prices and family atmosphere. I recommend this restaurant.
Ecuadorian cuisine with ample serving to keep your foodie stomach satisfied for a week.

reviews_data.snippet: We found this restaurant through Google Maps because it wasn't a far walk from our hotel and it had a massive amount of high ratings. Another plus was that it's open late and we are late eaters that found ourselves looking for a place that was open at 9:30pm. Feeling a little skeptical of all the high ratings, we decided to try it out and see for ourselves. I have to say, what the masses say is true. This place is amazing. We had Moises as our waiter and he was a huge part on why we decided to come back again on our last night in Barcelona. His customer service was outstanding and we loved his laid back vibe. If you go, ask for Moises!We ordered the ceviche, some combination plates, and the mixed fried rice. As others have mentioned, the portions are BIG. There was a lot of prawns and tuna in the ceviche and it had great flavor. My dish was the fried bream with the avocado salad. We all agreed that the avocado salad was amazing. Lots and lots of avocado and it was a refreshing way to start the meal. The fish came out steaming hot and perfectly cooked. We all shared the mixed fried rice and devoured as much as we could. Except we were so full.What an amazing meal that we were so lucky to have experienced TWICE in our short time in Barcelona. We are definitely coming back the next time we find ourselves in this beautiful city.

The only good thing here is the food. Service is horrible. They sat us down and forgot about us. We saw 3 servers attend to us like if we were unapproachable. non of them even said hello or showed gratitude. They didn't even check on us till we stood up ready to leave. Horrible service.

reviews_data.snippet: Amazing restaurant! Nice price and huuge portions of food, waitress are very kind. Great cheesecake with maracuja for desert! Definitely the best in area!

reviews_data.snippet: Excellent food, was like an hour to get in but definitely worth it, 100% recommended

El Ñaño was a pleasant discovery. The dishes were very generous and the service was more than excellent since the waiters will take their time to explain the dishes to you (At least in Spanish). The food was excellent so overall experience is 5/5!
