reviews_data.snippet: Great food and friendly staff
On sunday you must wait around 20 min for a table. Prizes are ok for the zone. Food taste like real Ecuador. Encebollado i like it.

title: Restaurant Malaysia
description: Stylish surrounds for Malaysian staples. Laksa soups, spicy curries & noodle dishes in a split-level restaurant with a feature stone wall.

reviews_data.snippet: Those who eat alone are neglected in many places. Not just here. There is nothing to criticize about the delicious food in the Restaurant Malaysia. Served appetizing and very tasty. Gladly again.
Authentic Malaysian cuisine. New location on Aribau is more spacious. Everything is delicious.

The food here was out of this world!The chicken Satay was one the best I’ve ever had in my entire life, the service from the staff was amazing.We ordered lots from the menu and didn’t hold back, as we wanted to try authentic Malaysian cuisine. I would recommend this place to anyone who is willing to try something new, trust me you won’t be disappointed!
Fantastic fresh food. Everything really nice except noisy kids running around. Hope it was a one time thing because I'm definitely coming back.

a wonderful discovery while walking along the streets of Carrer d'Aribau! the food was surprisingly authentic and the staff were very warm and friendly. would recommended this place to friends and to anyone curious about Malaysian cuisine.
Delicious food with excellent portion sizes and lovely staff! Flavours well balanced that you don’t just find anywhere, worth a visit for sure!We’re vegan and they were great at catering for us.
As a Malaysian, I would highly recommend this restaurant. Authentic taste and friendly Staff.

10/10 tasty food and very filling, lovely staff, good location, restaurant is clean and modern. Provides halal food as they show the certificate at the front of the restaurant so we didn’t even need to ask. I wish they had a branch in the UK!

👍👍👍 Authentic Malaysian food, reminds me of the taste of hometownIf you haven’t tasted Malaysian food before or miss the food there, you must visit this restaurantWe ordered the nyonya laksa & chow kuey teow and it’s so so so delicious, just a pity that I forgot to take pictures

We had an excellent dinner at Malaysia restaurant.The food was very tasty, we discovered new dishes thanks to the special menu. We really enjoyed this experience and we had an excellent service with Adeel. 10/10. Ma banha.
Outstanding food! They have a duck so delicious you will think you died and went to heaven
Friendly personnels, nice ambience and most importantly, very delicious food. As a Malaysian, it reminds me of food back home and the service is top-notch.
Sharing menus (minimum 2 person) look good

Soooo good!The food was amazing, fresh, fast and super authentic. 😍The service was just great, extremely polite, sharp, friendly and humble 🙏 I loved the place and will come back a lot of times with my friends. Highly recommended!!!!!!

What a surprise!!!We were walking and literally stumbled upon this Gem!! Loved loved loved the food and what great service. Met this staff named Adeel who took our order and made sure the whole experience was amazing!Would definitely recommend this place to everyone and probably visit again before leaving:)
Really welcoming and nice staff. Food is really good and very fresh. Pricing is quite moderate. Recommending it with all my heart! 😋
Awesome food, really tasty and nice and spicy. The staff is super friendly. Loved the roti and the lamb curry.
Big, attentive stuff, very nice traditional Malaysian food. We had satay chicken and roasted duck.
Absolutely incredible food here. With every dish that came on to the table, I was absolutely blown away. I will definitely be returning!
As a Malaysian, the food is exactly what I expect. Very authentic and delicious. Staffs are very nice too!
Authentic Malaysia food 🤤
Amazing Food. Very authentic malaysian Food. The Staff were kind and polite. Food was very good, the Restaurant clean an charming. Definitely go and try it yourself
It was so good. The place is beautiful. Delicious food with excellent service.
100% halal, superb food, great service - one of the places you go to repeatedly

Excellent chicken satai and the best pad thai I have ever had in my life. Service was attentionate and lovely. I did not like the desert too much black rice with coconut ice cream but it s my personal taste, I don’t think they did not make it right. I will come back. Merci ♥️🃏🌟

This was such a great halal find during our trip to Barcelona! The lunch menu is amazing value with a starter, main, dessert, drink just for 13€! The food (roti canai, satay) was authentic and reminded me of the food I had in Malaysia. We loved it so much we went back for dinner and had the char kuey toew. Highly recommended!!

So glad we chose this over another typical tapas place, 1 million % worth it, Ive been to Malaysia few times and il be honest it would be difficult to find this quality and authentic flavor in Malaysia, that’s how good the meal was
Wonderful food and service(great people!)Simply amazing!

ME ENCANTO!! I LOVED IT!! I chooses the menu they had for 18,50€ and I really enjoyed, took a soup for first dish and for second duck. Sorry I don't remember the names of the dishes, this was 2 days ago, but I absolutely will come back! The service are very nice and friendly, always with a smile in their faces.
Amazing restaurant, such great customer service. The food was delicious, I tried the meat and chicken and great portion for the main meals. Price was fair compared to other restaurants in Barcelona.
Good food, good service! Great value lunch menu in a centric location!

Authentic Malaysian cuisine as if you were there. Hit every palette of the the taste bud. The chicken wings simply marinated to perfection. Must try the Nasi Lemak and satay. The set menu is value for money! I would rate them 6* if I could. Would eat again!
Food here is amazing. Highly recommend.

One of the few places near Gracia where you can find a great fix priced menu for dinner. I usually order the curry soup with shrimp for the starter and the curry duck for the main course. Wash it down with an Estrella Damm and I'm all set.The restaurant is not fancy but comfortable with touches of Indonesian and Malaysian decor. The service is friendly and the price for quality and quantity is excellent.
Perfection !Service Perfect!Food perfect!Thank you very much !
Highly recommended. Taste much better than many Malaysia restaurants in Hong Kong or Singapore. Laksa and Char Keuy Teow are great.
Good and fast service. Delicious food and worth every penny 😍😋
Excellent service, the food was incredible and the atmosphere is very nice. A great trip to Malaysia from Barcelona

Awesome food, full of flavour, generous portion, friendly service, comfortable setting and excellent value. The only place I go to get my cravings fixed - nasi lemak, rendang, sambal, satay, fried rice and noodles
Great food! Friendly staff 😁
Truly an authentic Malaysian cuisine. The curry is really sedap!

Sorry about the pictures but the food was so good that taking picures was totally forgotten!Food was great and the service as well. Make your reservation because this place is wel visited... It has halal signs in the restaurant. I would definitely recommend this place!
Great food and great service!

First place we tried during our visit to Barcelona. Everything halal.They offered a really good service (both the gentleman and the lady were very nice and friendly). The food was very tasty and great for the price (we tried their 16.50 eur /per head Prix fixe menu and it was worth it!
Sweet flavors, they get us to Malaysia without travelling !
Delicious food. Attentive service. Reasonable price. Highly recommended.
Delicious food and very friendly people !!
Lovely food, very cosy and intimate atmosphere.Check if food is halal.

Its owned by a Malaysian chinese lady from Johor who has been operating it for 4 years. We had mutton curry, asam pedas prawn, mee goreng mamak, bebek menyatnyat (I ordered this out of curiosity!), fried chicken wings, gado gado and teh tarik!! We found all the dishes to be very tasty, and not far off our normal tasting dishes from Malaysia. And obviously its a halal restaurant...I would highly recommend this place to all!!
Great food at a great price, worth the walk up North from the main town area

Surprising malaysian restaurant. The menu is very complete at a a great price. Full of interesting flavours, I loved the satay brochettes with peanut sauce. The duck with creamy curry sauce was delicious too. Will come again!
So much food. So delicious.
The food was okay, I would not order from here again. I feel it was slightly bland and there was no real flavour, it also lacked the basic salt and pepper. The dumpling sauce was very sweet as well.
Amazing food and staff
Great food and excellent service
The food is delicious, authentic asian food that we enjoy so much. The place is nice and the services are excellent
Very good 👍
The food is orgasmic and the service is exceptional!
Authentic Malaysian food in Barcelona and it is Halal. Great food, friendly staff and so close to the passeig de gracia, shopping street with lots of high end brands.
We had a wonderful experience. The staff went the extra mile to help my partner and I celebrate his birthday. The food was also delicious. I would recommend this place to everyone.
Great food, friendly service & a valuable price.
Quite authentic
super authentic
Amazing place to have lunch. We had better bebek than in Malaysia! The staff is so nice! They even change my meal because I wasn't able to eat what I ordered(wheat intolerant).Really recommended!
The best malaysian food in the city!!!!!!!!

Wow. Wow. Wow. Where do we start?This is the best halal restaurant in Barcelona for many reasons in our opinion.There's a great menu selection. Ingredients are clearly fresh and of good quality. Dishes seem authentic Malaysian cuisine. The price is very reasonable. The food really well presented. The mango sorbet was the best I've ever tasted and I could tell that the ingredients were of great quality.The service was great and the waitresses were nicely dressed, pleasant and attentive.There was not a long wait for the food at all.We would absolutely recommend this restaurant to anyone. We ended up going 3 times during our 1w stay. Its a real gem.
Normalet

I cannot claim that I am an expert on Malaysian cuisine, but my lord of lords do they serve excellent food! The environment is enchanting and the service leaves you with a smile on your face. One of my favorites... The only complaint is that I live far away!
Very good dishes. Nice atmosphere.My friend said for her, this place was the best restaurant so far in Barcelona.
All the food here are halal, delicious,good customer service. If you like Malaysia,Indonesia and Singapore Malay food. Here is the place. Thumbs up!
Very good service with very good food. Can't go wrong. Would go back next time I'm back
Best halal restaurant in Barcelona
Food was great, reasonably priced and friendly staff. Would highly recommend.For bigger parties, jasmine rice portion might a bit small. Definitely worth the visit

Ate the set lunch menu for €10.50 and it was delicious! Taste is slightly different compared to dishes in Singapore but it is super good nonetheless! We requested desert for takeaway which they were not prepared for. But they fulfilled our request by packing our deserts in coffee takeaway cups 👍🏻 Definitely recommend the food and service. It is also HALAL!!! 😍💯

Good tasty food. Fast and friendly attention. The music and the decoration is just another ingredient that makes the lunch more enjoyable. If this review helped you in your journey please share it and thump it up :). Thanks!
Truly the best Asian food I've had. Very tasty and delicious and also very reasonably priced. Service was top notch. A must if you're in town.
Excellent food and service! It’s one of our very few favorite restaurants in Barcelona.Try their Laksa and it will blow your mind! :)
Delicious halal Malaysian/Indonesian food. They serve all kind of dishes. If you visit Barcelona you have to try this restaurant! The place is very clean and the people are very friendly.

Walked over a mile to get my South east Asian fix for dinner and it was worth the walk. Had the special menu, 2 courses + drink at €15.90, value for money! Beef daging main course and curry shrimp and chicken starter was delicious. A must try! Nice calming ambience made it a wonderful dining experience!
Very good food! We ordered the traditional rijsttafel menu. We were offered several small dishes. The taste was very good, just like i used to have it in Indonesia.
The taste of the foods are good. But can still improve to be same as original Malaysian taste.
1. Food was beautiful.2. We caught a taxi to their restaurant and arrived 3 min after they closed and the still sat us down and brought freshly cooked food.Highly recommend.
Excellent place. Lovely service and very tasty food. Strongly recommend
Alhamdulillah..awesome
Amazing food really tasty!

The menu looks very interesting and the service is relatively fast.I got unwell and sick after having my dinner here and suspect that chicken and sea food are not fresh.Also the restaurant is not well ventilated and the kitchen smell is very strong and sticks to clothes.
Great food. Went there for a work event in a large group (>20). Very attentive staff.
The food was amazing and for a good price. The service was great as well and we stayed for hours. Very enjoyable!
Not coming back, small portion, very expensive compare to the other joint

I've tried many halal malaysian restaurants in Europe before but this is by far one of the best if not the best malaysian restaurant here. The price is reasonable and the food taste authentic. Definitely will come back again to eat here if we visit Barcelona again in the future :)
One of my favourite restaurants in Barcelona. Ordered a 15€ 3 course menu. The duck was and the tofu soup were delicious!
Superb lunch, the spicy chicken and coconut soup and satay were outstanding!
Authentic and delicious, very consistent quality and always excellent service
Amazing experience. Food is spicy and exquisite. The price is economic. Keep this great relation price and quality!
Excellent ! We recommend if you want to eat great Malaysian food.
Amazing food at a great price. Feel so lucky we came across this place. Would be a regular if we lived in Barcelona permenantly
Tasty food. Correct service. Not big portions.
The food here is amazing. Service is good. Really enjoyed it.
Nice staff, very delicious and authentic food for a reasonable price. Also offer menus.
Malaysian and Indonesian cuisine. Good food and the staff is nice.
Amazing restaurant! Great service, delicious food, very pleasant ambiance and decor, along with reasonable pricing! Presentation and portions are also worth praising. Overall, highly recommend it!
Great customer service, good food and not expensive.
I loved it! Great staff and food!

I really like this place! A Family run Malaysian restaurant with tasty options for vegetarians as well and copious set menus for meat/fish eaters. If you like Malaysian / Indonesian food, this is a great spot. I recommend ordering some roti canai to begin!

It takes a Malaysian to know a Malaysian food. In general, the spiciness has been toned down to suit the local but the owner was kind enough to tweak the meal for me. Good food and decently priced. Highlight for me is Mee Kari. So creamy...
Delicious foods, nice interior. Recommended
A gem of authentic Asian food with great service. For lunch there is a menu with very good price quality relation.
This is what I expect from a restaurant to leave happily and say I’m coming back

Most authentic Asian restaurant in Spain we have come across Based on a mix of Malay and Indonesian food cooked in the traditional way Well worth a visit if your dining in the area and you won't be disappointed Try the desserts too 🌝
I recommend the excellence of this place. Whether it’s about food service or atmosphere !
Delicious Malaysian and Indonesian food. Very spicy and non-spicy options for all tastes. For dessert, try the Bubur Cha-Cha - it's different and amazing.
The best asian cuisine in Barcelona ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
A cosy little restaurant that delivers 5 star hotel foods. Highly recommend to everyone. Delicious

Worse Malaysian food I’ve ever eatenWe went for lunch on Wednesday 21st August 2019 at around 3pm. Having eaten Malaysian food a lot of time before, I can say that this restaurant is not authentic.I ask for a beef rendang and to my disappointment I was offered a beef curry with a big potato in the middle.The roti Chennai was just a regular pharata.If anyone wants to go for a nice malay food, I won’t recommend this place.Mohammad J Ruhomaun
Feeling lucky we found this place! The staff are friendly and served us pretty quickly with the marvelous original Malaysian cuisine!
Excellent Asian food. Good service.
Lovely service. Tasty food. Just like in Indonesia. What a treat. Thanks
Delicious food and awesome place. The service was tip top and i believe it charged us fairly. 15 euro for a set meal with drinks.
All the dishes feel like home - the taste of the Malaysian cuisine resembles the real food in our country 🇲🇾, Would come here again next time.

It feels like home! The way they serve the food definitely South East Asian food culture. Good thing that we have restaurant like this in Barcelona. Of course, I ordered the traditional "Nasi Lemak" and it was so authentic.
Great Asian restaurant in quiet neighborhood, they have really good curry.
Nice food! Recommended for a daily meal. Very good lunch menu too
Good Service and food also
Food was very good. Especially the beef curry
First we did a take away, another day we had diner. Good and tasty food, spicy if you like it. We are Indonesians living in the netherlands and we recommend it, Selamat Makan...
Taste great. Recommended for Melayu.
Definitely will come here again if I visit Barcelona again
Some of the most flavorful food! Good price and great service.

What can I say! The food is absoluutly amazing. Thats if you love spicy flavourfull food. Best Malaysian food we have had outside of Malaysia. The restaurant is a bit on the tiny side but in a weird way adds to it's wonderful atmosphere
Good food, reasonable prices, a nice come back to Indonesian cuisine :)
This is one of my favorites restaurants in Barcelona, food is delicious...really good service!

Decent price but not very authentic as the taste have been altered to suit local population. Curry is very mild & sweet despite us asking to make it more spicy. Too western for me coming from singapore/malaysia. Won't come again unless I'm desperate for home food. Decent price for set lunch menu though.
I really love being able to get a roti canai in central Barcelona. Nice small place not pretentious with good food.
Tried Kampung Fried Rice. It was nice and the staffs were super friendly.
Coming from southeast asia, I could not fault the authenticity of the food served here. Totally delicious. I would definitely wanna come back to this place.
Amazing food, been to so many Malaysian restaurants, but surprised to say this is one of the absolute best.
One of the best restaurants in Barcelona! The food is amazing and the staff is very welcoming.
Very tasty food and delicious desserts
Great food coupled with some great service. We would go back
Great restaurant and one of the best asian options in Barcelona! They have a 15€ menu super complete and food is delicious! Staff is also really friendly!TOP DISHES:Kari DagingSate Ayam
One of the few authentic indonesian cuisines in Barcelona. You don't see it from the outside or decoration but the food is good! And service too!
Very good amount of spice and price
Nice to have Malaysian food in town but missed some classics like Nasi Goren, it is ok ! But can improve
Real close to home cooked food. Worth the trip out for it.
The food is delicious in Bali. They have good menu options and the prices are standard in the area. Recommended :)
Great food here would definately go again
Good malasian restaurant in BCN
Very nice place.always be the best place to try malaysian food in barcelona.
Very good authentisch Food! Decent cozy place with good service
Despite the Indonesian name, this Malaysian restaurant serves excellent dishes from the region.

title: Restaurant La Panxa del Bisbe
address: Carrer del Torrent de les Flors, 158, 08024 Barcelona, Spain
description: Bright setting for creative tapas. Imaginative menu of tapas featuring global flavors, served in relaxed, light-filled surrounds.

editorial_reviews.summary: Where to Eat in Gracia: Barcelona Neighborhood Restaurant Guide

reviews_data.snippet: Friendly staff and the food was delicious! The combination of the ingredients were a surprise! Compliments to the chef!
Really nice food! Good service and a nice place to have a glass of wine while enjoying this gastronomic treasure 🍷🍛
Some amazing food and really great service when I went. A must visit. The duck cannelloni, carbonara zucchini and squid and chickpea are a must!

I spent a year in Barcelona and discovered many great places to eat but La Panxa del Bisbe is undoubtedly my favourite! The menu is innovative with exciting pairings of flavours. For the quality of food, presentation and service, the price is quite reasonable. They also have an excellent wine selection, a particularly good place to try some of locally produced wine. The cherry on the cake was 2 free shots (one anise based and the other I couldn't really tell) as compliments of the house.If you are in Barcelona, treat yourself to a meal here - you will not regret it! (Fairly near Park Guell so you can couple the meal with a visit to the park. Note: they are only open Tuesday to Saturday and have limited dining hours.
Probably our favorite meal during our trip to Barcelona. Everything on the menu was excellent. Service was a little slow, because they were very busy! Highly recommended.

This is a lovely little place hidden on a cute quiet street. It is worth finding. The tapas is really quirky and tasty. We had tomato bread, tomato with Spanish cheese, razor clams and jamon with tempura, couldn’t fault anything on the menu. However service was slow and the staff kept forgetting our orders but maybe it was due to the really really hot day. Worth putting up with the service though

We came here for lunch and ordered a variety of plates to try out. The food is all a bit fancy and pretty. My family enjoyed some dishes more than others. They liked the oxtail cannelloni and grilled octopus, the latter of which was very tender. For myself, I got the vegetable “mille-feuille” (not layered with pastry but thin slices of cheese) which was very tasty.The service was decent. Prices a bit higher than some other restaurants.
Delicious small plates with multicultural options! An outstanding and delicious surprise!
Beautiful restaurant with patio, nice relaxed atmosphere! I had a delicious gazpacho with lobster, will certainly go again.
So cool. The ambience and the inside terrace are so chill. The menu for share it's complete & healthy, non as others in the area. Waiters are so professionals. We'll come back again. :)
Not the best hospitality, don’t think I would return. The food was great however and lovely craft beers. But with so many options in the city, it does not stand out

Creative, well-executed dishes, at once familiar and new. We had a perfect lunch after visiting Park Guell and will return for dinner before we leave Barcelona. Highly recommended and worth a trip out of the way.
I loved this place. This is my favorite place in Barcelona. We had gaspatxo, ceviche, tomato tartar, lamb neck and smashed cod with poached egg. All was excellent with the ceviche standing out.
Perfect place. Food is very well cooked. Sauces are work good. Very good mood team. And more, it is not expensive. We really enjoyed :-)
Amazing food and beautiful presentation had the bread with tomato jam, foie gras with figs, daily special of grilled shrimp and the ox tail cannoli. I didn't want it to end. Will be back for sure!

I came to this place because of Yelp and it did not disappoint! We didnt have reservations, we came in the afternoon, I imagine at night it's even busier and they were pretty busy, full at one point!. I tried to make reservations online but they dont have that feature you have to call...I couldn't. Okay the food, there was nothing nothing bad on the menu! I kept on waiting for something to taste not good but that wasnt the case. Some may view it as pricey others might think it's ok. So we had tomato bread, it is delicious, this is a must try. We had the tartare de tomate with small toast, it had tomatoes, avocado, cucumber and other great things, yes great as well. We had the mussels with fries in a delicious sauce. We had the garbanzo- Gaxpasto soup which was good, cold soup. Cannoli, there was some pasta with oxtail, so tender and delicious! We had croquettes, they had chicken filling inside and they come 2 per serving. I had a beer with like lemon juice, it was good. Then came the brownie with ice cream and white chocolate! Do yourself a favor when in Barcelona, go try it, you wont regret it! It was like 64 euros for all and a soda. We walked so I'm not sure about parking situation. Enjoy the pics!
Splurge here, you won't regret it. Found this place on Yelp. Definitely recommend the €36 meal.
Try the 40€ menu! Great experience (and incredible service)!
Great service and excellent food! Great tapas, would recommend the oysters, ceviche, scallops, and desert. One of the best restaurants I went to in Barcelona.

Amazing food, exploration of tastes that everyone needs to try. Very close to the Park Güell. The foie was amazing (I mean really truly amazing!!!). Place is busy definitely reserve a table if you don’t want to eat at the bar. Watch the hours of operation as well as they work the Spanish way.
Excellent place to eat in, especially, taste gazpacho!
Great tapas and wine. Especially after a walk around Park Güell.
Very nice restaurant of tapas! High quality, so it's no that cheap and not in huge quantity (4 tapas minimum for two). Any way if you like great and tasty food, go there!
One of the best restaurant in Barcelona, unbeatable quality/price, super friendly staff, excellent!!!

Cozy with nice atmosphere restaurant. We opted for the "Variadillu" menu to try different things. We are glad we did, everything was excellent! Not expensive but not cheap, it is a good choice for a special meal. There is a cheaper menu or single plates.
unbelievable didn't expect such deliouces tapas each a dream
Love it! Food is just great and service was excellent
Just looking at the photos, I’m hungry again 😍 I recommend everyone goes there after I went!
You should take 3 dishes per person, and be ready to be amazed! :)

This place was in my top 3 restaurants after 7 days in Barcelona. These people are fantastic, enthusiastic and friendly. They have a passion for unusual fusions with great flavours that work very well. If you are a foodie come here they know their stuff. This place is a flavour marriage made in heaven.

Nice restaurant with nice tapas but overcast by the excess of political messages alienating customers who might not feel the same way. When sharing my opinion about this fact, I was rudely told that I was not in a position to comment as I didn't know the history the restaurant had with one of the independentist leaders. I don't find it very productive to impose your views on customers without even wanting to share your arguments. As a paying customer, I found it quite discriminating and also really not helping the current social division in Catalunya.
Amazing menu with many authentic dish. It was an exquisite dinner with a group of five people. Friendly and warm staff makes everything much better. Thanks a lot! Added to my all-time favorites list.

The lady settled us on the bar upon arrival and the table would be ready in five minutes. After ten minutes more people arrived without reservation. They gave them our table immediately. They apologized that it was in error, they said they had a table for us in a minute. Then the Asian came with his own drink and sat down at a free table. They didn't throw him out and brought him some olives.TIP FOR VISIT - take your own drink and maybe even food. They do not mind :)))

We were recommended this place by a friend. It is somewhat hidden away in a quiet street at the top of Gràcia and looks very plain from the outside.The staff greeting was warm and unassuming. We could choose our own table and sat in front of the busy kitchen.The menu is available in Catalan or English only, but there was no resentment that my wife speaks Castillano. We felt very welcome.The menu is primarily tapas, but all are quite good in size and priced very fairly. We were encouraged to order no more than 4 dishes (plus dessert later) and this was spot on.The wine list is interesting and the waitress was very knowledgeable on this also with good recommendations and help.The food was all excellent!!! I highly recommend and we will likely be back!
Great food and friendly service. Mostly tapas portions prepared beautifully. Reservation recommended! The chicken salad with mustard ice cream was fantastic!!Coffee also great (real coffee!)

I did NOT have a reservation, but they checked their list and were able to accommodate me at 20:00 on a Friday night as long as I was aware that they would need the table before 22:00, when a reservation was scheduled. I had the Bread with Tomato as an appetizer, and the Fish Tartare with Avocado and Egg tapas, along with a glass of their house red wine. All were excellent, as was the service. Some toasted bread was also provided, as well as a bottle of still water. Recommended.

Good stop off on the way to/from Park Guell. Scallops and the lambs neck were fantastic. Surprisingly good value for money given the quality of the cooking. Looks to be mainly local crowd, there's also plenty of choice of wine to go with the meal.

The food was fabulous. Had the Seafood fried artichoke with sea anemone was perfect. And while the tuna beet root salad was good, it had slightly too much dressing for me. Still tasty. The tuna tathki was great and the passion fruit dessert was 5 star. The staff was super friendly and helpful with food restrictions.

Went to have dinner with some friends. We always look for different things, for new tastes and particular ones. Overall could be a nice experience if you chose very wisely your tapas/dishes. Here you’ll find some strange combination that you might not like. But also some very good ones. Try to get more details about each tapas. The service was not good. Waiters very rude, very impatient with us. Something that will not make me go back again.
Poor service, they rush you to finish because of the next sitting. Small portions, overpriced.

Excellent food! The best by far in Barcelona. Imagine tasting the finest gazpacho with a hint of cherry flavor followed by a tender steak over grilled eggplant. A definite place to make reservations for dinner.

Very good Mediterranean menu. Helpful and friendly waitresses and moderately priced. Menu probably not ideal for kids. Be sure to ask for the chocolate bread dessert with black beer air and ice cream.

Walked in and was not greated. I was asked if I had a reservation even though it empty. No problem they seated us, but then proceeded to serve the tables that came after us first. After about 15 minutes decided to leave. Hope you have better luck
Authentic Catalan restaurant. The best pork foot I ever ate in my entire life.The staff was really kind and smiling.Really good experience.
Food was amazing. The service was incredible. They still sat us 15 mins before closing with no concern. Highly recommended

This place is legit! We stopped here for lunch and everything we ordered was awesome! Best lunch/tapas so far in Barcelona! The staff were really helpful and suggested some items. We tried everything and were super satisfied!

One of the best restaurant we've ever been. The food is not the usual tourist stuff, it's simply special. There's a lot of thinking behind the scenes and the result is mesmerizing.We tried several different tapas and we couldn't decide what was the best. Starting from the bread with tomatoes to the croquettes, to the octopus and the sirloin... Everything was spectacular.Last but not least, the service is fast and friendly and you feel right at home.If you're around the park guell, this is the place to eat great food and enjoy your time.
Best Place in Barcelona
Very tasty food, nice place to stay and very friendly and helpful waitresses. I'll come back as soon as I visit Barcelona again. Thank you!
This was a great meal. The staff were very friendly. And the food was delicious. We were the only non locals in the place and it was packed on a Thursday lunch. Worth the journey.
Just one word: AMAZING. Incredible tapas/menus.Superfriendly Service. Tip them (they definitly deserve it :-) ) !
Really good and well pricedCreative tapas and Spanish tastes
Great quality of food and friendly service. Selection of wine is amazing. Highly recommended
Service was really bad, we asked for bread three times and waited ten minutes for a bill. Fresh fish and foie were really tasty, rice was failure.
Very good food and very nice service. Not cheap, but worthy. The wine was superb too. Thank you girls! Basta lungo
As usually, a hidden culinary gem of Barcelona.
If you're looking for reasonable tapas it's a great place to go if you're not hungry. Overpriced and doesn't resemble any traditional tapas in the slightest.

great cozy restaurant. Especially recommend the menus. Worth it 100%. Will definitely come back next time I visit Barca. In short. It's a magic place to give a foodgasm to your stomach) Such amazing combinations of such strange ingredients... and it's soo bloody delicious!

Would highly recommend for those looking for a local vibe, slightly swanky/unusual tapas and amazing service. The wine is awesome and the owner very friendly and helpful ( I have a food intolerance but this didn't seem to matter, nothing is a hassle)You HAVE to have the chicken croquettes, as the menu says they are SUBLIME
Great and inventive food, dedicated waitresses. Unique option in Garcia.
Food is superb. Excellent service and recommendations. The Paccheri tapas is outstanding.

Amazing seafood, great service, high class presentation, unique flavors. I highly recommend this place for a fancy quality meal at a good price. His place was one of the best resteraunts I went to in Barcelona
Great food w/ awesome flavour, great service and air conditioning! Highly recommend.
Best restaurant in Barcelona I visited. Starters(croquettes), main dishes(rice, pork with mangoes), beverages(tinto de verano)...Everything was just awesome. I already miss it.
Delicious meal! The oxtail and sea anemone with rice was to die for, not to mention the beer that is there.
Great place for dinner. Good menu and service
The best meal we had on our trip to Barcelona and around the Costa Brava. We had 4 Tapetes and all were fantastic - more than enough for 2 of us. The Brazilian steak was excellent. Thank you!
Very busy at lunch on Tuesday, recommend to not go at this time, lot of pressure on the staff, they were stressed and arguiing decided not to eat here

Disappointing. Waitress with mustache was rude as hell. I’m not even talking “not friendly” I mean disgustingly rude. No word spoken other than”Que?” when she came to take our order. Literally no other word spoken the entire time. Felt super unwelcome. Food was average. Pretty awful.
The menu is not in Spanish and I didn' like the strange mix between politics and gastronomy. Overall I will not back again. For the same price there are better restorants in the area.
Catalonian food with a gourmet touch, a bto expensive. Very good own beer.
Nice little gem in Barcelona, its inner courtyard is a great summer afternoon location.
Amazing food! One of the best is Barcelona
Fantastic restaurant!! Tapas here are beautifully plated and taste exquisite.
It's superb. That's all I can say.
We had a great lunch. All the dishes looked great and tasted wonderful, service was also great
The wait staff was not good at all. At the end when we asked them to call a taxi for us - we had 3 little kids and 11pm, they called told us to walk to the big street.
Fantastic place with non standard dishes
Friendly waiters, food is fresh and a bit cistly but certainly worth it.
Taste good kind staff
Incredibly friendly service and amazing taste. I absolutely recommend to try the house beer and tuna tartar.
Awesome food, really accommodating staff, a must if you are in the area

Tapas ReimaginedCreative takes using classic ingredients makes this cozy eatery, who's a march away from Park Guell, wildly popular with locals~~TRY😍:AnchoviesFocaccia, Egg, Mushroom Salad~~OKAY🙂:Assorted CheesesBrazilian Steak with Fried Potato [meat was a bit tough]Follow us at IG📷: eatsmorefun
We tried the dentex tartar, lamb, iberico steak, tomato bread, burrata, and potatoes with truffle. Everything was amazing!!
Great tapas, freshly made wth very friendly and helpful staff
Tasteless food, unnecessary political messages on the menu, which is only in Catalan or English.
Very nice and creative "small plates", large tapas.
Very good food for a reasonable price in Barcelona
Probably the best tapas restaurant in barcelona.. Get in early because it gets full fast!
Tried one month ago, and our dinner was just totally screwed up by an arrogant and totally incompetent young waiter girl.Such a pity... :(
Good food, but very expensive place
Best food in Barcelona, overall experience was amazing!
Go here and have a taste blaze!
BEST FOOD OF MY LIFE
Tourist trap, overpriced salty food.
Excellent food!
Horrible service. It was totally empty when we walked in but no one was greeting us. Two other tables who came after were served before us while we were still waiting to order.
D P M
One of my favourites.
Normalet i car
Original restaurant a Gracia
Excellent!

Varem demanar per 4 el menú degustació, ens esperavem molts varietat i poca quantitat i pel contrari ens van portar a cada comensal el seu plat per probar individualment cada un dels plats, i a una quantitat molt generosa. He de destacar que el tartar era exquisit. Els postres també ens van conquistar.Es un lloc on si hi portes algú quedareu encantats!

We were a group of 10 and ate very well. Dishes with a lot of craftsmanship and quality products.For me the very good crispy pork ear, the base of pumpkin, onion and bittersweet sauce, very well found.Very good croquettes.Very good place for lunch or dinner.Very correct service.

De cocina abierta, se ve perfectamente quien hay dentro, pero no lo que se hace...hay que ir sin prisas y el servicio es agradable. La comida muy buena todo lo que pedimos; las croquetas un manjar de dioses. tal vez no recomendaria el bacalao pues el plato es irrisorio, un trocito pequeñisimo que no es suficiente ni como tapa. (Tanta fue la decepcion que se me olvido hacerle foto) Las cantidades de los platos no puedo ser ecuanime por ser la primera vez que voy. Tambien habia dos menus (para dos personas ambos) uno de ellos por 42 euros con ostras las cuales se habia acabado y nos propusieron sustituirlas por croquetas 😳...lo mejor los postres. El vino tenia mucho poso. Volvere para asentar mi opinion 🤗

Restaurant located in Gràcia where they offer a tapas menu and two menus. This time we decided on the menu where they offer dishes to share for € 31.All very good and well presented. For € 31 it would include the drink, at least a glass of wine or soda. Quite tiny dishes especially dessert. We will repeat when they let us go at night and test if they deserve the 5 stars.

Terrific. High level of cuisine, although you pay for it in portions that could be a tad more generous. Still, the croquettes and their grilled squid with tomato and watermelon are so good that they clearly deserve the highest score. The dish that I would not recommend is the bacon with prawns ... too greasy for my taste. The rest, a luxury.

Tout près du parc Güell, un restaurant à la façade sans prétention, qui vous fera découvrir la vraie cuisine Catalane, on y cuisine quasiment devant vous, les chefs travaillent dans le calme avec professionnalisme et surtout beaucoup de talent . C'est un enchantement pour les papilles et aussi pour les yeux. Très bon rapport qualité prix. Je recommande vivement.
The site is very good .. very local ..
Expensive menu but very good value for money. Highly recommended. Excellent service.
Amazing food. Excellent service. 100% recommendable

La Panxa era pequeña, casi minúscula, pero sabrosa e innovadora. Puro entretenimiento y placer para los sentidos. Ahora un poco más grande sigue igual de loca. Siempre innovadora llena de sensaciones, todas ellas metidas en el tríptico de la pared. Descifrarlo no da premio, sólo entretiene si alcanzas a co -fundir cada plato.

Super good food, especially for their “experimental” dishes, meaning you don’t find these ingredient combinations everywhere. The customer service is very good and the price a bit expensive but it's all so good you don't even notice.

5 étoiles bien méritées pour ce petit restaurant dans un endroit improbables et sympathique, proche du Park Güell.Une cuisine savoureuse et créative, de belles découvertes pour les papilles.Personnel extrêmement gentil et professionnel.Une expérience unique à Barcelone, très agréable surprise, à recommander vivement.
A find after visiting Park Güell. The proposals of this young group do not leave you indifferent. Be careful asking for a table in advance, we almost ran out of it.
Buena presentación de los platos y magnífico servicio.Un lugar para disfrutar del momento
COOL!! Menu with many varied dishes, rich and well presented, agility when serving and a very pleasant and quiet terrace. FANTASTIC, although not inexpensive.
Traditional Catalan tapas with Japanese touches and careful preparation. Highly recommended

Restaurant located in the Gracia neighborhood.We have gone as a couple and we have ordered all varied and spectacular tapas.The anchovies were delicious, the cockles brutal, I think they are one of the best cockles I have ever tasted, very large and tasty.The foie terrine is highly recommended, although if it came with a few toasts, better.Grilled aubergine with cheese and sesame cream and very correct croquettes and the octopus a tad dry but very rich in combination and texture.The beer is very good although the price is exaggerated (even if it's artisan, € 4.20 ...) although they make up for it because they bring you 1.5L of water for free.The service is very nice and efficient despite the restaurant being packed.We will repeat for sure!
Very good and elaborate food. Service is another matter, the attention is good, but it looks more like a menu bar, it lacks a touch of excellence when serving.

Very good! We went to dinner and ordered, among other things, croquettes, poached egg and yarrow. Very good quality and taste. The space is large and beautifully decorated. The white wine we ordered: perfect! In total we paid € 21 per head. Although we had booked and arrived 20min late, they looked after us and were very friendly and professional. Highly recommended!

As good as expensive. If you want to be full you will pay a lot, but it is argued with how good everything is. The quality is paid and the place in Gràcia too. Very nice terrace and very correct service.
Very good but sweet. The very alternative place.

Dues vegades hi he anat, les dues aprovades amb nota.Plats molt ben treballats, que combina ingredients típics o casolans de manera original.Recomanables les postres (totes) i especialment el pà amb xocolata, oli i sal.

Mediterranean food with innovative offer. I went to dinner with some friends and we ordered several dishes to share and a dessert. All very good. I recommend the cuttlefish rice.In our case, the only problem is that we pay more for the drink than for the food. The glasses of wine range between € 4 and € 4'70. If I ever come back I will ask for a bottle for sure, or I will take a better look at the prices 😂Correct service.
All very good and courteous staff! A must go if you are returning from park Guell
Molt bona opció per menjar de platillos.
I really loved very good tapas and very nice service. Craft beer. Reservations required

La Panxa del Bisbe has been a discovery in the district of Gràcia. It has a very nice inner courtyard, which is even more valuable in summer and in times of pandemic.It’s a bit expensive, but it fits the quality of the food it offers: original and tasty dishes ideal for sharing, such as foie with caviar lentils; quesadillas with provolone; grilled squid, or a refreshing and amazing mojito-flavored melon dessert.In short, a quiet space with friendly and professional service. Highly recommended!
Excellent gourmet cuisine, a warm atmosphere, a very friendly service ... to reserve!
Very elaborate delicatessen dishes, all very tasty, perhaps a little expensive for the quantity but it has been worth the experience.

Food cannot be judged. The service effectively discouraged me from staying in the premises. First she didn't take care of us, and then she unpleasantly exaggerated us twice. We felt uninvited so we left. We do not greet the rude waitress.
A spectacular place! We made the snack menu (30 € / person) and we loved it !!! The place is beautiful, the service very fast and very attentive and the food great! We recommend it!
recommended, very good everything
Restaurant with modern, creative and lively cuisine in Gràcia. Nice and near A good place to go and repeat. Is it worth it!
Highly recommended! Good product and friendly service. We will repeat

Casual restaurant with signature cuisine. All great. Very attentive and friendly service. They only have craft beers. Water is free. The dog? The quantity-price ... very small portions for the price they have.
Too many dishes. All very good, but not so much food. Dessert, bundle of toast with oil and chocolate ... Brutal.

Original and very good quality restaurant.La Panxa del Bisbe is an atypical place in the neighborhood of Gracia.The cuisine is sophisticated but tasty and you can enjoy the experience of having a tasting menu of the most "apañao".Make no mistake about it ... it is not a Michelin star restaurant but it is the best value for money.We took the "variadillu menu" and were able to try a great variety of dishes served there.I recommend it if it is the first time you are going to get an idea of ​​what type of cuisine they do.You don't stay hungry with the menu.The service is more than correct and they have a varied wine list.The shooter beer is artisan but, to my liking, some toasted or dark beer was missing.The main course is the great dessert of "Pa amb xocolata oli i sal" an explosion of flavors on the palate, bitter, salty, sweet ... impressive. I leave you a shabby photo of it.All the food is prepared with quality ingredients and it shows.Nothing was repeated to us despite taking a great mix of dishes and ingredients.The place is small and with a discreet but cozy decoration.We didn't go to the toilets so I can't tell you how they were.They have an interior terrace where I think you can smoke.The kitchen is open with a large bar and depending on where you sit you can see the bustle of the cooks preparing the dishes.In short, a good place to pay homage or surprise a friend or visit with a varied and original menu.
Tot mooolt bo. Original dishes, very tasty and with the right amount. Good wines from little-known wineries. Very good customer service.

Cozy place and beautiful industrial style, seasonal product with very rich tapas. Reasonable value for money, important to book as it is always full. Good service i advise you. They have craft beers and the water is free. Price for 2 people: 4 dishes + bread with tomato + 2 craft beers and 1 dessert to share € 59.10 👌we will be back another day.
Spectacular. Very good food and excellent service. To repeat several times.

If you doubt one of the best restaurants in Barcelona. And if you consider it from the point of view of value for money, it is definitely the best. You can eat from classic Catalan cuisine to dishes inspired by the cuisine of different countries with an interesting gastronomy.
Ideal for sharing. All very good. And very nice inner courtyard space.
All very good! It stings a little in your pocket, but it’s worth it.
Beautiful restaurant with excellent cuisine and friendly service. Especially locals as customers, which benefits the atmosphere in Barcelona overrun by tourists.
Very kind. Food of 10.

Interesting menu, with regular evolution combined with essential classics such as duck gutter, always different rice or bread with oil and chocolate… and its craft beerA place where you can go back and not repeat dishes.Good preparation and presentation. Correct service.
Lovely people with a lot of drive and a desire to do things right. An ingenious and delicious menu accompanied by wines suitable for the occasion ... Going to make "a belly" is always a good idea.
A unique place in Gràcia where Xavi and his team can delight you in 3 dishes and a dessert

Super service, superb meats and wine. We had the tasting menu of 3 cuts of 600g total, which we cannot recommend enough. Perfect temperature as requested. Friendly staff smiling and helpful during the entire visit. Price-quality-rario is sublime.

Nice Argentinian restaurant although not exactly my taste. Little bit too stiff environment, but the filet was very good and soft inside. If you are going for a date or celebrating your 10 years anniversary or something similar then this is the place for you.
Great Dinner and friendly service. Loved the empanadas and the meat.

Never in my whole life I have had such a nice steak. Such a shame we only found it 2 days from our departure. They clearly know what they are doing and can cook the meat to perfection. They had excellent wine and desert recommendations. The staff was cordial and kind. Great restaurant, would definitely recommend!
Super delicious food and romantic place its great to have a wine for a date there

We went for a business lunch there. Cool thing is that I was able to make a table reservation online quickly. the place was OK, servers were really nice but it was too expensive for what we had. Food was really good, but too pricey for what it was.

Amazing amazing amazing food and service. Our server, Carlos, was absolutely incredible. One of the most courteous, kind, attentive, and enthusiastic waiters I have ever had in my life. The steak was insanely good, and cooked to medium-rare/rare perfection. We shared several starters, which were all superb. Then chose the “meats of the world” option for the four of us. This particular menu item allows you to select three different meats and serves two people, but we shared six for the whole table of four. Carlos brought each round of steak to the table, sliced a piece, and ensured that it was cooked exactly to our specifications. If it wasn’t exactly what we wanted, Carlos took it back to the kitchen for them to put it back on the grill for a few seconds. I cannot overstate how incredible the quality of meat, preparation, and service were - absolutely outstanding. THANK YOU to Carlos and the entire staff for such an amazing experience and truly wonderful food.

reviews_data.snippet: My husband and I had a wonderful experience at this restaurant. The food was delicious and the staff were extremely welcoming and friendly. I had the empanadas which were delicious and then the filet. My husband had the rib and both were perfectly cooked. The wine recommendation was excellent and there was a good selection of desserts. A great option for steak in the city and reasonably priced for the quality of the meal and service. Will return.
Very pleasant staff, chic atmosphere and very affordable price for the quality. Special mention for the chef's filet which is excellent!

One of the best places to eat in Barcelona. Love the stuff and their kindness. The best Argentinian meat you can eat. Well done, juicy and tasty as hell 🍖🌋loved the place also. Luxurious and clean. Well done 9reinas.
Great meat and excellent service. Always seated at the private room in the top floor, perfect for good conversation. They only lack of a hot stone when they serve you a t-bone.
It was amazing! Great food, wonderful service.

As all the other branches, the meat is extremely good. Nice looking place , prices representing the good quality. On the day I visited, there was unpleasant sound from Air conditioner , I’m sure it was temporary.
Meat was great staff was friendly, wine was also delicious. Price is way up there but its what you expect when you order wagyu beef so all in all i can only recommend.

Very good meat, cooked as requested. The salads though are a bit dissapointing as are small and not very good. I expect The crema catalana to be much better. But I insist that the meet was Excellent....

it was nice enough but the steaks weren't Argentinian style at all.When I was in Buenos Aires when you order a steak its the size of a plate.These were fine, but not what I was hoping for.Would I say it was the best in Barcelona, hmmm. I'll have to try another.Service was great. Lovely young lady very attentive and kind.
Very good restaurant. The staff was very professional and attentive, the food was delicious, nice atmosphere, reasonable prices. Recommended especially if you like meat.
Perfect restaurant; influenced by Argentina.

Really good service here to match the very good food. Quite an array of dishes and meat cuts aplenty.Not the cheapest of prices (not outrageous either) but certainly worth it.Welcoming of tourists and patient to boot.Reserve via their website.English menu available.Cards accepted.
Service was impeccable, our food was perfectly cooked. Steak tasting menu is a must. Highly recommend this place.

reviews_data.snippet: Very good service but some of the things that were written on the menu were missing ( the asado for example). The empanadas were perfect for the first course. For seconds I ordered the "lomo bajo" that was very good. My partner order ravioli with meat that had very very strong taste and was bearly edible. They charged me for 7.5 euros for each glass of wine - very expensive for my opinion. Also each meat is being served with very small portions of bbq vegetables - they defenntly could add a bit more for plates that costs between 20-50 euros. They gave us some cava free of charge at the end that was very kind.My verdict - it's a bit expensive for my taste and for meat restaurant experience I would prefer to go to something more local that offers the same quality, bigger dishes for less money.
Really good attention, and beef recommended.
Very tasty meat and desserts, friendly waiters and nice ambient. Prices are fully consistent with location, service and food quality.
Good food and great presentation
Great steaks and very good service
Great Argentinian food place in Barcelona
Solid steakhouse, nice people and good service.
Great food and ambiance

This is an amazing Argentinian restaurant in Barcelona!!! All meat cuts are exceptional and cooked to perfection!!! Never order more than medium, even if you like it a bit more cocked like I do, so that you can really taste the flavor of the meat!!!And the Vega Sicilia Único was outstanding!!!I’ll be back!!!
All great.
Great food and service

9reinas is the best restaurant if you want to try the best meat cuts of the world. Without a doubt in Barcelona they are the leading one.The service really made it perfect really good recommendations and very well taken care of had a really lovely evening.

Found this place on line via Google and Trip Advisor. Last night in Barcelona, my wife’s birthday and she wanted steak. Well - we were not disappointed. Amazing staff, great vibe, wonderful menu, great recommendations on reasonably priced and great tasting wines. Best meal we’ve had in Barcelona. And they poured whisky on my ice cream. 👍
The food: 🔥🔥🔥 The staff : ❤️❤️❤️

The best argentinian in Barcelona! The food is excellent and the waiters always nice and helpful! You have to try their 'solomillo del chef' and the 'volcano de dulce de leche'. Also the chimichurri and their bread are incredible 😍

5 adults visited this evening , from the moment we walked through the door the service was excellent.If you enjoy well cooked meat and good wine , this is the place to visit. Expect to pay a fair price , but well worth it.
Great meat and great service. Fair prices also. Highly recomended!

Steak was phenomenal, we ordered too much. Unlike the US, all steaks come with some side of potatoes. We had both waygu cuts and the some Argentinian cut off the "Around the World selection". ALL were phenomenal. Will definitely be back again!
Everything was really good, from the nice waiters to the appetizers to the EXQUISITE roast meat. Even the pastry for dessert was delicious. Thumbs up!!!
It's a very good place to go and have some luch with the family. The steak was actually very nice. In my opinion, it is a little expensive, but it definitely rents it out.

Argentinian steakhouse - Recommended by another guest at our hotel. Delicious, perfectly cooked steak. Lovely meal

Been to this place before and it was amazing. So tonight, when I had a special guest, decided to visit them again and they really let me down. The red wine was too cold and the quality of the meet not as expected. The waiter tried to change my mind, but as in the past they've managed to impress me with their standards, she only made it worst.
This was my 2nd visit to 9 Reinas and it was as good as the 1st time a year ago. The food is excellent and so is the service.

Dinner for two at 9 Reinas is one of the best dining experiences in Barcelona. The starter, main course and the desert is the best food we have experienced in a long time. My favourite is the fillet steak which was cooked to perfection. This restaurant is one of the best secrets in the city.A big mention must go to the serving staff who made us so welcome and looked after us all evening. A big mention must go to Julio who was professional and funny who had a good knowledge of the wine and food menus and can't wait for our next visit.
Came with wife and 14 month old daughter. Menu was really good. The steaks we had were cooked perfectly. Would definitely recommend. Wine list was great

If you love steak this is the place to go, but make sure you have a reservation. We had three different cuts all cooked to perfection and all very delicious. We loved the crispy waffle fries and eggs and the mozzarella starter. Wait staff was very friendly efficient and we didn't have to wait between courses. The restaurant was very beautifully and simply decorated and the wine list is reasonably priced and very good.

Inexpensive and overated, simple and elegant but stiff and boring, without charm. Flat. Spend your prescious time somewhere else. Barcelonas food circuit is diverse,vibrant and entertaining, not this place.
One of the best meats I've eaten in a while. Julio was amazing, I work in the hotel industry and will definitely recommend this place without a doubt.

We had a group dinner there, and chose a menu. The starters were nice, the meat was really good (but the quantities were a bit little) while we had a lot of potatoes to go with it. Puddings were fine too.

The best steak I have ever had in long time. Small and romantic place. Make sure to make a reservation. The grilled chicken also was amazing I really give the food 10/10 and the place 8/10 the service 10/10 our server Diego was very helpful in choosing meals.
Perfect service and food!Cozy, nice and elegant!Price was a little high, but fair for what they offer.Even the dessert was delicious, we had a dulce de leche cake
Best steak ever, we ordered chunk eye, skirt, and Argentina fillet steak they all amazing. Highly recommend 👍🏽
One of the best steaks I had in my life!Worth every cent!!

Very classy place, with very good/excellent service. The food was excellent.Price wise.. You can find the same quality with little less but i spouse that the pricr its for the service not the food...Thanks for a great birthday meal!

By far our best meal in Barcelona! We didn't get reservations until 10:15pm and it was worth the wait. The service was OVER THE TOP fabulous, wine selection wonderful, and food simply divine. Can't wait to share with others traveling to visit and hope to be back one day ourselves!
Quality red meat and wine plus good service.
Great food, reasonable pricing, dessert & service on point
Everything was perfect! Service was exeptional!! Federico our server was so nice and the food was delicious.

Freddy our Concierge at Hilton Diagonal Mar recommended your Restaurant for a Great Steak....Did he ever get this right..Absolutely delicious...Great Service as well...Definitely a must if coming to Barcelona....
Excellent food, atmosphere and service! If you go there, try their Argentinean wine and the mollejas!
Food was great. The meat was delicious.

We were looking for a good steak dinner and the W Hotel recommended two places. We chose this one based on their website and menu. We were not disappointed! It far exceeded our expectations!!It is a tiny place from the outside you might just walk right past it without noticing, but a priceless treasure in the middle of bustling downtown Barcelona! Very cozy little get away from the crowds and noise.Our order was taken by one of the owners who was very personable and with fantastic service! The food was delicious. If you want a good steak, look no further. Their pasta is made from scratch. Everything we had was bursting with flavor. Savor every bite. Portions are very grand. Not typical gourmet tiny but not huge either. Just right.We felt welcomed and part of the atmosphere. As if we were extended family! You could tell they loved their customers. Many of the staff were conversing with customers at other tables and even their children.Cannot recommend them enough!!! If you are in Barcelona, go!

response.snippet: We are really glad you spent such a good experience with us Kristi, thank you so much for your review.We can't wait to share your thoughts with our followers on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/9Reinas/Thanks again and we hope to see you there very soon.All the best,9Reinas
