title: Luzia
address: Carrer del Pintor Fortuny, 1, 08001 Barcelona, Spain
description: Modern surrounds for Mediterranean meals. Tapas to share, pasta & grills, plus sushi, in a sleek setting with wood accents & an open kitchen.

reviews_data.snippet: Great place for a spot of lunch.Freshly made pizza from their oven was crispy and tasty. The pasta was filling.Another good dish is the chicken Fajitas large portion so make sure to share with others.Also the decor is very cool, there's actually a paper dragon hanging from the ceiling.

Nice good healthy decent food. Beautiful ambience. The staff were friendly but were run off their feet. Busy place. Credit cards accepted. The place would be even better with a little more attention to detail.

Mozzarella leek truffle pizza with egg yolk. Quite nice with super thin crunchy crust.Andalusian fried calamari..tender and impeccably fresh but the preparation was a bit too oily ...fryer temp might have been off kilter. Still tasty. Small portion for 12 euro.
Very good Italian bistro in Barcelona. Fresh and tasty pastas and pizzas among other international dishes. Casual cozy environment with friendly service. Good cocktails too.

The wine was great, and the food very good. I've had better pizza before but it was still very very good. Dessert was great too! I would definitely go back. The service was good and we didn't feel rushed at all.

This was a very nice setup, cozy ,very friendly people and a service with a smile. The wood-fire baked pizza was delicious, the prawns fresh and tasty and the spaghetti was fabuleus. We had a coffee after and that the crown on top of it all. Prices matching quality and fair. Absolutly toprange

Just off the Rambla, on a side street, Luzia is a pleasant place to be. Spacious and good illuminated, with comfortable seats and sofas and nice music playing softly.We enjoyed the food. We tried the mozzarella - leek - truffle pizza and the spaghetti carbonara. The pizza was very tasty with a crispy base.The waitress came at once to take our order, despite being Saturday and the place full and we were surprised at how quickly we were brought our food.We were treated with smiles and politeness.We were allowed in with our dog, who was offered spontaneously a bowl of fresh water.A good experience!
Highly recommended this restaurant located right off La Rambla.

Do not be tricked by the decor and nice setting. This was one of the worst experiences I’ve ever had at a restaurant. Service was slow and poor, the portions are very small and the prices are ridiculous for what you get. The pic of the calamari and chicken wings was from the ‘to share’ section, only 5 wings!!! I also ordered my son a burger which never came. Then when I asked for the bill it was on there. I expressed my disappointment to the ‘manager’ to which all he said was sorry. I paid 40€ for 2 waters, the sharing dishes and some spaghetti Bol. AVOID THIS RESTAURANT.
Perfectly located. Really good food and nice personal.
Fresh and tasty food. Lovely ambiance. Excellent and hygienic kitchen.
Loved that atmosphere and friendly staff. We had the sirloin and the salmon with a cheese tapas. Everything tasted great. Awesome Sangria's as well! We had the sangria de blanco

The food was very small in portion size (5 pieces of shrimp as an appetizer is €11.50), rather expensive (about €13 / dish minimum is about what you will spend for mains), and you will have to shell out another €2.10 for a 500ml water because they don’t serve tap water. The food was good, but not amazing. If you are an older person looking to spend a bunch of money for a fancy vibe, this is your spot. If you are a traveling student looking to ball out on a budget and just pay as little possible for the best tasting food, then definitely look elsewhere.

The best meal I had in Barcelona💕. We oredered chicken fajitas for starters and the presentation was a nice surprise. The burger and pizza margarita were both really good. It was crowded, however we were atteneded to quickly. The service is excellent. Recommended 👌

Upon entry, this place looked 5 star material. Modern and cosy looking interior design and a comforting atmosphere, especially an open kitchen where you can see the chefs cooking. However from there the experience was not great. My partner and I wanted to select a particular table, but were refused, despite it not being a full restaurant and that table remained vacant our entire stay. We ordered 2 ham pizzas and it was burnt all undernearth, overly crispy and for our personal preference, it had far too much ham on top.Overall a nice looking place, but a far from pleasant and accommodating experience.
After all the good reviews online, we decided to try it out. Food is average, I was expecting a bit more in flavors. Checked it off our list and onto the next.

Cozy and such a good place to stay away from the shopping “zombie area”. Sometimes you may even get to see an owner sitting down and enjoying the awesome food.I had shrimp pasta with garlic and pepper - the shrimp was amazing as well as pasta, but pasta felt a little bit dry missing a bit of sauce or shrimp’s liquid when you fry dem; the service was excellent with waitress being attentive; the interior is superior - they have a freaking dragon, DRAGON CARL!!Btw try their cheese cake - but careful you may have a foodgasm face!
Very homely and cozy place to eat breakfast.

Really nice atmosphere but service is quite slow, especially for pizzas. The tapas are amazing but the pizzas aren't as reliable (but still great)! Staff are usually helpful, and the location is awesome.
Nice and versatile place with great food and good service.
Highly recommended. Good food great atmosphere
Best place i've been for a long time. Great atmosphere, design, people and extra tasty. And - fast!

The perfect place for lunch or a chillaxed dinner. Food is great and very varied, so you can find something for everyone here. Excellent tapas and gazpacho, although a bit pricy. Luzia provides a perfect balance between a fine dining restaurant and a more relaxed lunch cafe with its music in the background. Really nice interior and ambience, and the staff is lovely and very helpful too!
Unbelievablely tasty and fair priced. Would recommend to anyone.
Great food. Lovely music
Nice tapas - I recommend the Guacamole and of course the Iberco ham, which you should of course have with every meal while in Spain.
Excellent tapas, friendly staff, delish sangria, clean (unisex) bathrooms, great location- one of the highlights of our time in the city.
Very enjoyable place. Fine tasting food. Wood oven for the pizzas. Kind and respectfull service. Remember to look Up for the huge paper dragon.
Perfect place for a quiet breakfast just off La Rambla.

From the moment we entered the restaurant, service was awesome. I could tell from the salad and bread, that the food would be excellent. Once we received our dinner we were delighted, dinner was great. The dessert was no less satisfying.Love the ambiance.. 10/10 would recommend
The dry tomato and cheese pizza + non alcoholic san francisco were great.

Very welcoming, open and clean atmosphere. Menu is not huge, but there is certainly something for everyone...nice tapas, a few pastas, a few grilled meats and of course wood fired thin crust pizzas. I had the margarita pizza and was very good. The servers were very friendly and were extremely kind with our lack of Spanish speaking ability. Would definitely return.
Immediate homey feeling, wonderful, chilled music and great food! Definitely recommended!
Great place for breakfast. Salomon and scrambled eggs are amazing.

One of the best places I've been at in Barcelona.The food was great, very tasty, the offering is not big and not small, just about right. The service is perfect, everyone is very kind, you won't wait too long for your food. The place looks great. Everything is very clean.I highly recommend this place!

3 courses all absolutely delicious. The steak just melted in your mouth and such tasty veg full of flavour and the right amount of crunch.The staff were very attentive and I would highly recommend this restaurant.When I come back to Barcelona this is definitely on the visit list.

Very nice, upscale restaurant. Tapas are great here, wine is good. Don't ask for a martini. A gin martini with olives was ordered. What appeared was gin and something sweetish with no olives. Just very weird taste. It's higher priced than places just off Las Ramblas, but it is very nice.
Excellent food and service! Good to share with friends so you can try many different meals.
We eat tapas and tapas and tapas again. And it was a marvellous experience.
Fast. Good. Friendly.
Very healthy breakfast and quite affordable. Luzia's has a very nice and hip atmosphere. Like eating in your own kitchen
Excellent food, tasty tapas, friendly service

Horrible experience that ruined the evening. When asking the waitress what type of salad dressing came on their chicken salad, she said none. After explaining to me over and over that rocket is arugula. Yes, I know that. That wasn’t my question. I want to know what dressing the salad comes with. I asked for a vinaigrette on the side. When the food came it was the wrong salad all together. Luckily it had been brought over by the manager and he fixed it. The salad did come dressed with dressing and as I anticipated I had an allergic reaction to an ingredient in the dressing and is why I asked for a vinaigrette on the side. We were charged 2 euros for bread THAT WE NEVER ASKED FOR and never saw our waitress again after ordering. If you don’t know what comes on the food and at least a basic understanding of ingredients, for the well-being of all of your customers, get out of the restaurant industry! On top of it, my husband’s steak was supposed to come with potatoes but it came with some lettuce on the side instead. What a complete waste of $42 euros. For your sanity, avoid this restaurant at all cost.

I was absolutely in shock with their horrific customer service we received there. We ordered Carrot cake and there was mold on the cream, realising it after eating half of the cake. After pointing it out, they brought another piece of cake without any apologies nor explanation, so I asked how it happened(if the cake was from the day before). They said they just buy the cake so they did not know. They didn’t charge us for the cake we ordered.What shocked me the most was not the mold but that they acted so normal, even after they let the customer eat molded cake, and they did not care enough to give a single apology. Things happen especially when you buy from the bakery outside. However, it is unacceptable to serve it to a customer and I am surprised that they did not take it seriously at all of the situation and maybe thought I was just pointing to get a free cake. Didn’t sign up to eat a molded food!!!Such a shame because the other food and the space was nice (Even though I would not want to go back to pay £8 for a small portion of tortilla)
Very good service. Good friendly staff and manager. Good vegetarian choices. So good that we came back twice in two days!

We dined twice in "Luzia", during our stay in Barcelona for a week. We were very heartily welcomed by the manager and our waiter Veronica. We received a very nice recommendation on wine and food and we loved the atmosphere. Despite it was packed and fully booked both days, we were accommodated quickly and politely. Thank you Luzia people.

Dinner tonight was great. Wonderful atmosphere and restaurant design. We waited a bit before a server came to our table initially, but after that it was perfectly attentive service. Could be because they were quite busy. We shared a cheese board, garden Salad, and pasta bolognese. The salad was one of the best we’ve had in Europe. It had tomato, cucumber, onion, carrots, and avocado with a vinaigrette dressing. The cheese board was perfect to share for the two of us, and came with fig jam, a few grapes, and crusty bread. Flavorful and meaty bolognese with Parmesan. Would definitely recommend eating here.

Went here with a party of 4 and everything was so easy. Sat us right away and our waiter was not only friendly but funny and entertaining. Price was reasonable and the atmosphere and decorations were really charming. It's a great place to go for not upscale but not too casual either nice place to eat. Am going back before I leave. Highly recommend.

The restaurant looked promising with a pleasant ambiance and initially polite staff. Unfortunately the food and consequently the service was severely lacking. After some mediocre tapas starters we had a Tortilla and a Camembert salad for our main. The Camembert was breaded and deep-fried within an inch of its life, it came out extremely greasy. The salad, while not unpleasant, was just leaves and a few oily nuts. The Spanish omelette was very undercooked to the point it was inedible slop on a board. We asked for this to be cooked again and it returned hardly any more done. After picking at a small bit of the better done part of the omelette we abandoned it, raw egg and salmonella is never good before flying. The bill came and I asked if the tortilla could be taken off the bill. This was promptly ignored at the bill was brought unamended. I asked for it to be to removed and the waiter was most indignant stating we had tried it so it can not come off the bill. After several awkward minutes arguing about it we paid the full amount. There are many great restaurants in Barcelona, this one is best avoided.
Very nice restaurant, lovely quiet environment, gentle music and polite staff. The food is excellent, I will be visiting again.

Surprisingly good! I had thought that there would not be that much care given to the food or service given its customer base is mostly tourists, but I was def wrong. I sat at the bar, which had a front seat view of the open kitchen and was impressed by how professionally and carefully the chef orchestrated the food and service. Would def recommend!
Very nice service! Dog friendly by the entry. Cozy and well decorated. I like the huge suspended art work and overall ambience. The pizza from their wood oven was crispy and spicy like I asked
I ate grilled free-ranged chicken. There were also grilled red pepper with sweet sauce and mashed potatoes. It's very delicious. The place's atmosphere is cool. I highly recommend this place...
The pizza was great and crispy. One of our favorites. The service was highly average and slow But good food and worth a quick visit.
The ravioli here surpassed all other ravioli's I've had before. The menu catered as well to a diverse group of eaters and included some great vegan options. Would highly recommend.

I am currently having lunch at Lizia and felt compelled to give this place a review. I have been in Barcelona for 2 days and this is by far the best food ive eaten here. The pizza is amazing and the fajitas are also brilliant.Highly recommend!
Incredible food... Surprisingly good for such a touristy location. Friendly service, comfortable. The tapas, burgers, and pizza are all amazing!

Rudest waitress ever. Came to table 15 minutes after seating then left said "too busy" came back after 10 then left abruptly. Struggled with non Spanish speakers. She left! Never saw her again. Next waitress saved the day. Terrible place. Writing this prior to eating so maybe food is OK. So disappointing for service 😣 update. I enjoyed the food.
Perfect place! Very delicious food. Great service!

Friendly staff and very good food. It‘s central located and the prices are fine as well. The music covers, which were playing in the background and the ambiente was very nice. Thank you for having us.

Found the service typical of Spain, friendly and not rushed but unlike a few places, when I said I needed to go, they came quickly (my two little sleepy kids in tow). The food was excellent and this was one of my favorite meals during five days in Barcelona. Highly recommend.
Amazing food! Great atmosphere & music. Polite employees!
Great place for breakfast! Great cheese sandwich, granola, eggs w/ bacon, great orange juice.... perfect start in the day! And that's not too easy to find in Barcelona...
Nice relaxed interior. Staff very friendly but limited breakfast options. Coffee and fresh orange juice was very nice.
Really delicious with good vegetarian/sea food options. The restaurant is very big, has views on the street no matter where you’re sitting. Service is slow though.
Nice food and nice place ~^^
Excellent place.. the salads are amazing.. every thing is good and tasty..I will come back for sure
Very good restaurant. The service is very fast even when the place is crowded. The pizza, burger and fajita are delicious. I gave it 4 stars because the price a little bit high.
Great service. Fresh baked breads and natural products. Outstanding customer service.
Delicious breakfast! Super cozy place. Really chill and laid back!
Very chill atmosphere.. food is of high quality. They’re margarita was Phenomenal. Really cute staff as well hehe

Great place for lunch or an evening meal. Very nice food and good service. Reasonably priced menu and nice wine choice. We had breakfast here every day during our stay and ended up eating at Luzia for almost every meal.
So yummy! Order the chicken quesadilla and garden salad. The breakfast is very good too. Reasonable prices.
Tasty food, Good atmosphere. The layout of the kitchen was interesting, Really enjoyed watching the chefs. The pizza's were really nice.
Love the food, atmosphere and detail orientation, even the music is selected carefully.. just amazing!
The ravioli where overcooked, expensive and a very small portion. The sangria was extremely bad, tasted like made with syrup combined with alcohol. Very disappointed.
Good location. Chill atmosphere. High quality and tasty food. Good service (speed and waiters).Patatas butan and oven pizza are amazing.Surely gonna be back there.
Great tapas style food. Good value for the prices and nice atmosphere. Oh yes. Wonderful sangria!

Less than average.The servise was ok.We had a starter to share but no plates to eat it.The pastas we had as main courses was overcooked and the flavors was just acceptable.The crispy onion on top of the torilla tuna sashimi was cwewy.Not good value...

This place is very beautifully decorated and has great atmosphere there is cosy and very relaxing, its great for going to for relaxing with friends and having a chat. The staff are very friendly and polite and service is great and efficient. Unfortunately the food is so so. We ordered the chicken and it was so dry and tasteless. The pizza was also dry, hard and tasteless. Come here to relax and catch up with friends, and never mind the food.

Perfect little restaurant providing food all through the day (and late evening). We stayed in the 1898 and although we tried a few restaurants around we came back to this because of location and food quality. Wood fired pizza oven gave great pizzas; far better than anything on las Rambles. Would definitely recommend, especially for families!
The atmosphere was quite good and cozy. The food was also well cooked and delicious. Prices are a little bit more than normal.
Nice
Interesting menu with good preparations. Good music.
Good pizzas with thin crispy crust and a lot of tasty cheese. Perfect size for the evening (not too large).
Great food. Very interesting menu. We went several times during our stay and each time the dishes were high quality and very tasty.

Service was fine until our server thought it was funny Big Papi was shot in the DR, and then accused me of being tired because I didn’t remember a conversation that he had with my husband while I was in the bathroom. Way surpassed friendly with being an offensive jerk. Don’t come here, arrogant jerks will serve you.
People were not so friendly and in a hurry. I had a steak which was good but my girlfriend had the veggie burger which was a bit dry.
Great service and very good food.I had a beef steak with veggies and potatoes and was very satisfied. Beautiful restaurant off of La Rambla
Wandered in on our first night in Barcelona, had a great meal. Great service. Went back and ate at the bar/kitchen and watched Roberto do his drink majic. Outstanding!
The best service I have ever had. The burger was plain, the salmon perfect, the pizza was ginial
Great meal experience! Tapas are well worth it. One of the best restaurants near La Rambla!
Fantastic good food!!
Excellent wood fired oven pizza! Also tried the tomato and feta salad (delicious) and the fried artichokes (good, but not outstanding). Cava sangria was fantastic.
The food was amazing, great flavours and lovely sangrias. Highly recommend the food, the location is just on the corner off of the main road!
Good relaxed restaurant with tasty thin crust pizzas not far from Las Ramblas and not too expensive for the city centre location
Awesome food. The fried shrimp was very delicate, done just right. The jamon was awesome as well as the mergherite pizza. Fried potatoes are a great choice.
Better than the normal fair. Everything is good and some things are outstanding. Such a great cozy and homie atmosphere
Great tapas. Good service .
Very good food, I had for starter the shrimps, was great. One of the best places there in the area.
Nice and warm place like home!
Good interior and food was not bad, however, overcooked pasta served within 40 minutes even though there are so many empty seats. After complain, waitress throws our dishes to the table :(
Decent vibe and not expensive. Would fDefinitely go again!
Great coffee & Food. And also breakfast set menu was really good. It's a good place for breakfast or brunch.
Excellent food..friendly staff and good value...Best salmon I have had for ages....well seasoned..a gem well recommended.
Great food, nice interior. The waiters sometimes forget a few things if you order many versions of tapas. Fair prices.
Very friendly staff and really tasty food!
Good food but the service is terrible, we got the wrong food and the waitres started to making a scene that "we are wrong" and she is right!! Very unprofessional!!!!!
Great place! Amazing food

One of the best meals we had in Barcelona. Between five people, we had 8 tapas plates (patatas bravas, the chili/tacos, and mussels really stood out) a pizza and 3 pitchers of white sangria and it came to €25/person. A serious steal for the quality. Will definitely be coming back!
Definitely a tourist trap, only go if you want a quick bite close to the Ramblas.
Very good food and friendly service

Great food and prompt service. We had the corn pancakes (which are actually just tostaditas), the squid and green beans with chilli - these are amazing although it's probably because vegetables are hard to come by in Spain. Give this place a go.
Great and fresh food. We went there twice and were pleased with everything. We do recommend this place off La Rambla.
Party of 4 for a late lunch. The food was fantastic and service attentive. A favorite of our time in Barcelona...
Great Italian food. Caters to tourists, but the quality is still good. Atmosphere is superb
One of our favorite places! Great food!
Good food but the front door men it's really antipatic
food was very delicious, service wasn't bad but the waiters don't speak English!!
Very friendly staff ... Great food even for veggies.. excellent coffees
Great food. Recommend the potatoes bravas and shrimp.
Very nice restaurant with amazing tasting, fresh food. My girlfriend has a few allergies and they couldn't have been any more helpful and gave us a menu with all the ingredients in each dish
Very good tapas and friendly staff. It is worth to have a dinner here.

Horrible!!! Don't get inside!!!!The Sangria contains more water than anything else. The cocktails are full of ice (two thirds of the glass...). Just to mention this....In terms of service, there is no word to qualify the nosy attitude of incompetent waitresses. Ages to get the check. Years you ask to pay the check. And, at the end, the customer is insulted!!!Go somewhere else : you really have the choice in this fantastic city
Excellent food, cozy atmosphere! Wood fired pizzas tasty, foccacia good, tomatoes & artichoke tapas excellent... all drizzled with quality olive oil! Very tasty mojitos! Friendly service.
Great for breakfast. Central location. Great price
Excellent breakfast. Food was looking good, tasty and prepared with great care.
We each ordered burgers. Two well done and one medium , they all had the same consistency which was disappointing that they did not accommodate. Food and ambience was good.

I'd like to start off with letting you know that I don't give 5* easily but this place deserves it. The service is very prompt and professional, food is delightful. Like an explosion on your taste buds of some amazing tapas. I would totally recommend it. Both tourists and locals come here, so that is a good indication of how good it is. I recommend the tuna sashimi and the asparagus. The pod carpaccio is delicious too!! They accept Amex!!!
Good food and service. Don't forget to ask for NO plastic straw when ordering a drink.
Best food in Barcelona so far! the tapas were all fresh and tasty. Pizza base was thin and crispy. DELICIOSO! ¡Olé!
Good, homemade and vegetarian Friendly !Water was very kind !
Free WIFI. Pokestop here. Good breakfast selection, but quite pricey. Chic and warm atmosphere, wide windows, good place to unwind from the crowd outside.
Excellent tapas, excellent service. Good winner at a reasonable price
Second time at Luzia and unfortunately we are going home tomorrow. By far not only the best food but also the best service in Barcelona. I would come back to Barcelona to go to Luzia.
The pizza is extremely thin...more or less like burnt cracker. The toppings are ok. Staff are rude. Not impressed.
All around nice place. Food was tasty but not the best I have had.
Recommend by a true Barcelonian. We all had a great experience!.
Lovely staff and great food and atmosphere
Loved the food . Quattro fromage Pizza is delicious
I love this restaurant, the food is delicious, always has a bustling and fun atmosphere and some of the sexiest and friendliest staff in Barca!!I bring all my friends here when I am in the city.

We dined at Luzia's in Barclona twice both times were enjoyable. The atmosphere is wonderful, the tapas style food was extraordinary and the experience with Fouad our waitor made our experience over the top, he was kind and friendly.
Excellent service and even better food!! I Strongly recommend!
DELICIOUS!
Good food, fast service and good atmosphere just 10m off La Rambla
Great Italian food with friendly service

It's really nice place with polite personal, however I was weri disappointed with traditional calamari. It was dreadful, really chewing and tuff. From freezer. Lime mayo witch is served with it was was eaven more disgusting. It was to much sour and inappropriately bitter. Eaven tho it's a nice place.
Fabulous food, great staff, ate there 4 times in a week, our favorite
very tasty food, friendly service, nice place
Terrible service. Lousy pizza.

title: Arcano Restaurant
description: Creative dishes in a 1600s stable. Artful Catalan tapas, plus Mediterranean meat & fish dishes, in a stone-walled 17th-century space.

reviews_data.snippet: We were staying near the Santa Caterina market and tried this place on a whim. So glad we did it was our favorite restaurant we went to while in Barcelona. The food was innovative and delicious. Cannot recommend this place enough.

response.snippet: Thank you so much Rachel!

reviews_data.snippet: If it wasn't for The Fork we would never have found this place. We celebrated 20 years married on 10th and had a lovely dining experience from the set menus. The food was lovely and the service great. Would go back for another celebration or with visitors.

response.snippet: <3 thank you !

reviews_data.snippet: It was perfect. The sangria was the best that I have ever had. Delicious! I recommend.But first you need to book the table)

response.snippet: Thank you!!

reviews_data.snippet: Delicious food, cozy place. I would go there again.

response.snippet: Please come again :)

reviews_data.snippet: The experience here was amazing - the staff was very friendly, the food and sangria were very good.They offer menu for 27 euro that contains starters, main course and dessert. The starters were tasty and interesting, but quite big portions, we were almost full after them.We had pork and beef meet which were delicious.You should make a reservation as it was a queue for entering.

response.snippet: Thank you Teodora!

reviews_data.snippet: Excellent! Sangria is the best. Food is delicious! Recommend

response.snippet: Thank you SO MUCH!!

reviews_data.snippet: Arcano is our new favorite restaurant! This is our second trip to Barcelona and so glad we found it.It is off the beaten path and not a tourist-heavy location. Beautiful inside with the old stone exposed all throughout and a bit dimly lit.Service was fantastic and food even better. Lots of great options on the menu. We had the octopus leg and skirt steak. Easily the best meal we have had in Barcelona so far.Would recommend stopping by to anyone.

response.snippet: (Translated by Google) Thanks August! We hope that everything returns to normal soon so that we can open our doors ...(Original)Gracias August! Esperamos que todo se normalise pronto para poder abrir nuestras puertas...

reviews_data.snippet: Overpriced and I hate the damp smell in the back room. Decent food but just not worth the money. Great service though

response.snippet: Thank you for your visit and fir taking your time to review your experience.

reviews_data.snippet: We went to this restaurant for my partners birthday. Every morsel was subtlety delicious. We started with a green peas puree, then progressed to Ibirico had with bread. Goat cheese before the mains. I had the cod over spinach with black garlic.The cod was wonderful, falling apart in huge flakes. There was a buttery consistency to the fish. The spinach was cooked lightly so that it wasn't soggy.We finished with a delightful crumble and cream dessert. It was light to the taste with the individual layers all adding to the complexity of the desert.A complimentary fridge magnet was presented at the conclusion of the meal. Ir was a delightful end to a wonderful meal.I would highly recommend this restaurant for the food and service. If you go for dinner at 7 you should be able to walk in without reservations being made.

response.snippet: Thank you so much!

reviews_data.snippet: Very special place, amazing atmosphere.

response.snippet: Thank you Gabriela!

reviews_data.snippet: I ate here for my birthday. Great service and amazing staff. The Grilled Octopus was cooked perfectly and served beautifully. I definitely reccomend. Also, have the Cava. :)

response.snippet: Thank you Caleb! Thank you for celebrating you birthday with us! And happy birthday!

reviews_data.snippet: Simply exquisite, refined and delicious! Everything that tapas and dinner should be while in Spain.Bread with tomato, burrata, octopus.

response.snippet: Thank you for your visit! We hope that you come back again soon!

reviews_data.snippet: Fantastic find! We had dinner here on Saturday night - fabulous staff and the food and wine were divine! We had a lovely bottle of pinot noir and 3 courses each. I had tuna tartare to start and lamb rack for main - both stunning dishes. I will be back for sure. Such a lovely ambience in this restaurant.

response.snippet: Cat, thank you so much for your kind words! We hope that you come back soon!

reviews_data.snippet: The way how they are cooking is amazing - food was exceptional but how they prepared vegetables is off the roof! Definetely I will come back!

response.snippet: We definitely love to pay attention to details and respect the products we use. We are glad that our clients can see it. Thank you so Much!

reviews_data.snippet: The ambiance is very romantic, the service was top notch, and the food was delicious as I don't order fish very often. The wait staff was very attentive and helpful with helping me decide what to order. I will be going back for sure.
Amazing food, potato bravas and mushroom appetizer were delicious. I will be back

response.snippet: Thank you Oona!

reviews_data.snippet: Fantastic restaurant in the heart of the Gothic Quarter. Best food we had all week and we eat like Kings in Barcelona. Wasn't horrendously expensive considering the quality. Good service too. Good wine.

This place was our last evening meal in Barcelona and we’d wish we went sooner! We split the grilled octopus and I have chicken and my partner had steak PLUS we had a bottle of wine — WOW! Not only was it one of the best meals we had on the trip, it wasn’t even as expensive as some of the others we’d had where we didn’t order wine and didn’t enjoy ourselves nearly as much! It’s fine dining meets casual / laid back, which sounds like an odd combination but it’s true! Very earthly and chill but elevated and they did things beautifully here! Even bring you new glasses and cutlery for new courses!
The best restaurant in Barcelona! Great food, staff and location.

This was one of the first places I tried when I moved to Barcelona, and I just keep coming back... They have a very broad selection of food at a very great price and quaility. Their plates are super creative and everything tastes amazing! Must try

This restaurant was our favorite meal in Barcelona. From the ambiance to the food presentation and taste, everything hit the mark. I really enjoyed the rack of lamb with chimichurri salsa. Also the tiramisu for dessert was particularly delicious. Would recommend to make a reservation as it seems to be pretty popular.

One of the best restaurants in Barcelona by far...Arcano never disappoints.They started tonight with a shot glass appetizer of green onion soup. How did they know I love onions? (I could eat an onion like most normal people eat an apple... Really!).I did my best to try and eat 'healthy' so next came the grilled veggie plate with a wonderful romesco sauce. Of course the grilled purple b onion was my favorite!The main course was lightly grilled tuna with a soy reduction. I have NO words for this, just come and try it.No meal is complete without liquid dessert. If you like anise, then give sambuca a try. It's a licorice flavored liquer.The Italians say that you must have exactly 3 coffee beans in the sambuca, not one more, not one less. It's for good luck.There's a million restaurants in Barcelona, most of which you'd never remember. Arcano is the plane you go for a meal you'll never forget.

reviews_data.snippet: We chose Arcano for our anniversary dinner and it felt very special, all the food was delicious! We decided to try one of the tasting menus, to have an overview of the plates of the restaurant. I personally loved the tuna steak, it was very tender and the combination with the Japanese sauce on top was perfect. A great thank you goes also to the team and our waiter, we couldn't have asked for a better evening!

Arcano was highly recommended by friends ... and they were right. We had Halloween dinner at Arcano and were fortunate to get in without a reservation that evening. The food was exceptional, in particular the grilled tuna and skirt steak. The staff were exceptional, providing spot-on recommendations from and descriptions of the menu.
I really enjoyed this place. Great atmosphere, great food and good wine selection. Easy walk too. I would recommend trying this place when you next visit Barcelona
Best food in a world, ever!!!

Probably one of the best restaurants, if not THE BEST restaurant I ate at while here in Barcelona!! The quality and taste of the food is outstanding! The service is very attentive and superb (a rare find in Barcelona). The space feels so authentic. The price of the food is way less for the quality of food that you’re receiving. I ate the salad with goat cheese (the best goat cheese I ever had. Didn’t taste pungent. And it’s so good I ate it anyways even though I’m lactose intolerant lol). I also had the sole fish with olive paste. DELICIOUS! I also ate the mushroom and sausage ravioli with the mushroom sauce, and that was the best. You can tell the pasta is made fresh, AND the sausage taste wasn’t over powering the mushroom taste and sauce. My husband had the rib eye and it was the perfect size meet and cooked perfectly: not over cooked at all. For dessert I had the brownie and it a had the most rich, authentic, deeply flavored dulce de leche dollop on the top of it. I literally felt high in heaven afterwards from the gastronomical experience I’ve had in a very long time! Thank you Arcano for the outstanding experience!
Delicious food and place!

I had the Sirloin steak (excellent) and some dessert, I have to say the food was great and really good quality ! The atmosphere and the place are very nice and cosy!staff is welcoming, helpful and friendly especially Marcelo great personality!Overall delightful experience definitely will be back!
Very nice place for food lovers. It's romantic and the service is perfect! You can try different kind of taste!

It was great food, food at a very high value level with retention of local flavors and specialties. Wait staff that was informed, prompt, unobtrusive, and talented.

My wife and I visited this restaurant. Being Americans, we didn't realize the late dining traditions of Barcelona. That said, we arrived at 530p and had a fantastic meal, along with an appetizer and great desserts. Tucked away on a side street, it's easy to miss this gem, but it's definitely worth seeking out.

The food was pretty good but expensive for what it was. They do have a nice mix of Spanish and other menu options if you are looking for a change. My main complaint was the wine. I took a guess and ordered a 16€ bottle of wine. After finding that it tasted bad (not spoiled, just not good), I looked it up and found it retails for about 3€. The markup seemed excessive so I would not recommend ordering wine by the bottle here.

reviews_data.snippet: My wife and I got married today and made a reservation for dinner here after our wedding. I must say, this is by far the best dinning experience we’ve had in Barcelona. We have been here a whole week and every restaurant we’ve tried has been excellent, however, Arcano is literally a perfect restaurant. If I could rate them 10 out 5 stars I would. Javier at the bar and Fernando our waiter provided the best service I’ve had in a long time, these gentleman were kind, welcoming and informative. The service -perfect, the food - outstanding. We couldn’t have asked for more. Thank you Arcano Restaurant.

Arcano is my favorite restaurant in Barcelona! Its in the old town of Born. The food is incredible. Ive been going to Arcano for a couple of years now. The staff make you feel right at home and they are so very friendly. A big shout out to waiters.....Matteo, Marcelo and Carmelo! Thank you for making our evening always a special one!!
Beautiful atmosphere. Great service by our waiter Luis who explained the menu and its portions very thoroughly. Amazingly delicious food. One of the best churrasco's I've ever had.

Outstanding food, wine, service and atmosphere. Great with a large group including a few kids. Nothing was too much trouble, very flexible. Marcello was terrific. Would definitely come here again anytime. Highly recommended.

Service was quick and cheerful. Meals were well sized without being over the top. Would absolutely go again.

Was really excited to try this place out. We live nearby and often walk by and see how elegant and old world looking it looked inside. Finally took some guests for lunch, had the menu of the day - ordered the tomato salad and entraña (Argentinian) steak with chimichurri, and the fresh fruit. The food was okay, not bad but not great either. The ambience is really neat but if I am going to eat out, I want it to be amazing. Would not return as there are so many really high quality great restaurants to eat at.

I love going to places where customer attention and food quality are present, nevertheless, this authentic Spanish restaurant goes way beyond good, it excels. First of all the, the plates I ordered along with my friend's denoted by themselves personality and flavourness, I loved the goat cheese salad. The attentive personnel was professional and made the eating experience even better. I would love to come back.

Came in for lunch and got an amazing meal for a good price. Full course for 15-16€ with drinks included. Great meal and service. Waiter was patient with us. we were tourists and a medium sized group but the server was patient and very nice. Food was timely, well portioned, and tasted amazing. Well deserved 5 stars.

description: Chic modern spot for Mediterranean tapas. Stylish tapas bar & bistro with an open kitchen, specialising in Catalan & Italian cuisine & wine.

Absolutely Amzing food and staff
Nice place, tasty food, great staff 👍🏻😊
Enjoyed my dinner. Recommend the ox meat!
Had an amazing night at this restaurant. The food is delicious, vibe classy and waiters are very kind and professional. Highly recommend and will definitely come back!
Great ambience and good italian food, true to its origins. The green risotto with shrimps and the carbonara were amazing!
Italian and catalan cuisine combined in a nice and not noisy place with great service.

I really enjoyed my dining experience at Barcelona Milano. Food was really good and you can tell all waiters are well-trained and good at what they do, which customers appreciate it. I had mushroom risotto and it was just amazing! Tiramisu was on point (approved by our Italian friend)Highly recommended!

Our was overwhelmed by the taste and presentation. Served quite fast even on a busy Friday. Staff was very helpful and nice. I’m not sure if there is access for wheelchair to WC. Parking in street

Went with high expectations after hearing praises from locals we’ve met a few days earlier. The staff is very friendly, and the dishes are good. The impression we’ve walked out with was that while the food isn’t fancy, they are true to the basics and flavorful.
Food 4/5Service 4/5Location 5/5Good catalan and italian cuisine menu. Beautiful plance and great wine selection.

Beautiful restaurant! In the menu you can find catalan and italian food, their risotto is amazing and for only 9€, impressive. Big list of wines and the service is always perfect, is one of my favorite places in Barcelona.

I can’t speak for the restaurant because I’ve ordered via Glovo BUT this was the best food I’ve ever ordered period !I’ve ordered many times with Globo “premium” and paid for the premium restaurants, was never worth it until today. The food was gorgeous and really tasty! I will for sure visit the restaurant soon.

Atmospheric ,style and service at a high level ..The appetizer and main dishes tasted of home-made quality and good ingredients..Thanks to the chefs and staff for a nice experience! I'll be back to try the rest! Restaurants like this always have a place at the top of the list !!
good quality food, but too small servings... if you're hungry, you better go somewhere else

We happened upon this place by accident while looking for a Deutsche bank. The concept of the restaurant is a straight shot mix of Spanish and Italian faire. The menu is split in half so you have the option to chose from one or both, mixing and matching to create your perfect tapas experience. The restaurant itself is beautifully decorated and scrupulously clean, also deceptively large. We were seated swiftly and the staff spoke very good English. We decided to opt for the Spanish side of the menu as we were trying to experience local cuisine and we werent disappointed; the food is to die for! It is a little on the expensive side as far as tapas goes but it is well worth the extra euro for the quality. We will definitely be returning.

I accompanied them by ordering the Parmesan cheese tapa that is accompanied with a sauce of balsamic vinegar of Modena. Although I chose Italian dishes from Milan. It has sorprised me for good!The burrata with confit tomato is delicious and generous in measure. A dish to share that will not leave you indifferent.Second, I ordered some lobster spaghetti that were not on the menu, but I do not regret ordering. Delicious Although it raised the average price of food, they are so rich that you forget.If you order à la carte, the average price is 15 euros for a second course, so value for money is more than correct. The lobster came out at 40, but it is lobster.For dessert and to top it off I ordered the classic Tiramisu but the restaurant presents it in the form of an original long meringue. reviews_data.snippet: The staff was very friendly. He showed me the food's pictures and explained me what all it has when I was struggling with the Spanish menu. The food was awesome.

I came today for lunch with my son, after a visit in camp nou. Lovely place, where mainly locals come for their lunch. It's a family run restaurant, very casual and friendly; they're attentive to their customers. I truly recommend it!

This place is so lovely, that we did not want to try another restaurant in the few days we were in Barcelona.The restaurant has a wonderful atmosphere, which is characterized mainly by the people. They are very communicative, giving you the feeling of being a very welcome guest. In Addition to this, the food is just awesome (Magníficamente)! Whether breakfast (bacon, eggs, bread), coffee or tapas - everything was delicious and prepared with passion.After being there a few times, I would also blindly trust the recommendation of the staff.If we are back in Barcelona, we will definitely come by. Hopefully the restaurant will stay that way for a long time!

The menu was unclear and I was charged separately for items I understood to be in a combo. Ended up paying ten euros more than expected due to poorly formatted menu and confused waiter. The food was average but service was well below average (forgot drinks, etc). Would not recommend.

response.snippet: We are really sorry that you felt upset,  but the waiter duly informed you how the menu worked and that the special dish (450g Galician beef chop) was not included on the menu (it’s written below the menu and its price).  Therefore, if you order a Lasagna from the menu and the special dish of the day you will be charged as stated on the menu.  In fact, we invited you to some typical Galician shots.We are sorry if you didn’t understand, we always do our best to exceed customers’ expectations and provide the best service we can. We change the menu every day to offer a wide range of possibilities to our customers, this is why we print the men every morning in paper.We are really sorry that you didn’t feel at ease in our home. Thank you for your review , we will always keep working to improve day by day.Sentimos que se haya sentido engañado, pero el camarero le informó debidamente de cómo funciona el menú y de que el plato especial (chuleta de ternera gallega 450g) no estaba incluido (está indicado debajo del precio del menú). Así que si se pidió una Lasaña del menú y el plato del día se le cobrará como está indicado. De todas maneras también fue invitado a un chupito y tratado de la mejor manera posible.Sentimos que no lo comprendiera, siempre hacemos lo posible para superar las expectativas del cliente y ofrecer el mejor servicio posible. Cambiamos el menú cada día para poder ofrecer una amplia variedad de platos a nuestros clientes, por eso los imprimimos cada día en papel.Sentimos que no se haya sentido a gusto en nuestra casa. Gracias por su opinión, siempre seguiremos trabajando para mejorar día a día.

This place blew me away. For a restaurant on the corner of a square quite unassuming and hidden, this is a gem.We were initially told there was a 20 minute wait when we first arrived which didn't bother us as we could see it was busy so we wandered around to see if anywhere else was available and came back. By this time we only waited a few minutes to be seated on one of their outside tables.Our server/waiter Sebastian was phenomenal from the start, he could see my partner was a bit chilly so kindly offered to turn up the heaters outside for her. We were recommended wines which were both perfect. All of our food was of very high standard and tasted great. At every opportunity Sebastian tried to make our meal special from even the smallest things like not leaning over us to place fresh cutlery. We received this amazing service even though the restaurant was booming the whole time and he was doing this for everyone. The fact that this was standard for him and this restaurant deserves 5 stars.

reviews_data.snippet: My friend and I decided to have a great meal to celebrate finishing our work placement in Barcelona! However, THE SMALL, OLDER WAITRESS WITH THE RED HAIR ruined the entire evening for us. My friend and I decided to split a bill of €65 between us (€32.50 each). This woman tried to charge us extra which we were not happy to pay as her service was mediocre , nothing special. She then mocked and scoffed in my face. Out of embarrassment, my friend gave her a tip which I am very angry about as this was in front of other customers who wanted a quiet, peaceful evening. She is a bully. She shouted at other staff members (the younger, male waiters working on Sunday night from 9pm were fantastic and super nice) and slammed menus on the table next to us. It is obvious this woman had a major problem and I believe it should be addressed. I will not be returning to your restaurant which is disappointing considering that it is so highly rated.

reviews_data.snippet: The overall experience was nice, however, as the bar is located in a 5 GL hotel we expected superb service and it was not the case. As a 5 GL, imho, the QR code for the menu should be improved - it was printed on a white A4 sheet of paper and cut out (not even straight). The devil is in the details. That being sad, the drinks were tasty and the staff were friendly.

reviews_data.snippet: Lovely place. Must try is a tuna steak and lobster roll. The staff is super friendly and view is nice. They have offered us nuts and olives while we waited for the food. The portions are medium, so it's better to order food for sharing or make it like a degustation.

response.snippet: Dear Lucie,Thank you so much for visiting us and for leaving such a nice review about our colleagues and food.It is true that Mood Rooftop Bar is well know for its sharing food ''style'' as most of the locals are enjoying a few dishes while taking drinksThe lobster roll is actually one of our guest's favorite since the opening of The One, BarcelonaLooking forward to having you again, on our fabulous terrace, located on the 9th floorHasta pronto!

reviews_data.snippet: Had an event for my MBA class here. The staff was so nice, professional, and accommodating. The views were amazing and the bar had such a great vibe that I would definitely come back again. I highly recommend it!

response.snippet: Dear Rohan,Thank you so much for visiting us recently and for leaving your amazing comment. We will be happy to have you back anytime.Best regards,

reviews_data.snippet: While the views from some tables are good, the food is not to be desired. We tried a number of different dishes and found all to fail by some measure. We recommend it for drinks but not for dinner.

response.snippet: Dear Patrick,Thank you so much for coming to Mood Rooftop Bar, here on the 9th floor of The One, Barcelona.It is true that the views are amazing form here, especially while arriving and on some spot, as every places the view is greater. While the view matter, we hope the atmosphere, the service and the company was able to balance it! As for the food, if we could ask you to be so kind to send us a note on what was not desire, this would be of a tremendous help, info.hto@hotelstheone.com, so on your next visit we could pay extra attention on those points.Again, thank you and we look forward to having you with us again.

reviews_data.snippet: Sadly we had the worst experience ever! The view was amazing, but the service was so incredible bad. They didn‘t had mojito and also no signature cocktails. We ordered champagne and first got sangria and then cava… Beside the drinks you will got candy which isn‘t tasty at all. Never again!

response.snippet: Dear André,We are sorry to read you were disappointed with the service on your last visit at Mood Rooftop Bar and understand that you were disappointed with the service. We have passed on our comment to our Food & Beverage manager who made the necessary training to team. Please accept our apologies.

reviews_data.snippet: The octopus was delicious!! Atmosphere was great and service was on point. Great view from the rooftop.

response.snippet: Dear Mr. Vega,Thank you very much for your evaluation and your comments. We are very happy that you enjoyed the food and the atmosphere of our Mood Rooftop Bar.We look forward to welcoming you again very soon.Sincerely,

reviews_data.snippet: the food and drinks were good. however, the service left much to be desired. we wanted to sit outside and mentioned it - multiple times. upon entry, and brought it up twice again to staff members. they told us “we couldnt” … yet, we watched multiple tables walk in after us and sit outside. additionally, another table had been sat near us inside and were relocated outside….. even though we had asked first, and were there first. we found this so rude and offensive. i can’t help but wonder is racism played a part. would not recommend this place and won’t be returning. very dissatisfied with the service we received at a “nice” place like this.

response.snippet: Dear Amira,Thank you for visiting us recently. Your comment is of course very much concerning us.Please be aware that Mood Rooftop Bar being a restaurant, we do accommodate guest according to consumption on peak hours. Hence, visits are welcome from anywhere, however our staff need to sit guests according to the time of the day and weather of course.As of your comment on racism, rest assure that with a Team of over 24 nationalities, and clients from all over the world we are definitively not seating/serving people according to their originWe are sorry you may have felt that way,Truly,

reviews_data.snippet: Excellent food, great service, nice view

response.snippet: And Fabulous pictures of yours! Thank you so much for your visit and for posting your pictures and great comment. See you soon hopefully.

reviews_data.snippet: Great views on the 9th floor of the one hotel when you stand up. The food is decent but €21 for a Gin Mare is the most expensive we have paid in Barcelona. ln most other equivalent hotels or roof terraces it is about €14.

response.snippet: Dear John,Thank you so much for your visit and comments.We are very happy you enjoyed the views at Mood Rooftop Bar and took note of your comment on our prices. Our gin Mare with tonic is indeed at €19 and our prices for a gin & tonic range from €16 to €22, depending on the typo of gin.

reviews_data.snippet: We were seated outside and the waiter did not come to our table for more than 20 minutes to ask if we were ready to order or if we wanted water. Terrible and slow service!

response.snippet: Dear Fatima,Thank you for your visit. We are sorry about the delay in service. As we do seat our guest upon arrival, we are surprised that no one came to your table and can only apologize for the delay.Truly,

reviews_data.snippet: Burger wasn’t bad, service was friendly, and the atmosphere and design is nice. Overall, food was average for the price.They charged €6 for a bottle of TAP WATER from the filter. Greedy and unexpected.The hotel’s reply below suggests they don’t care to make things right for customers.
If you like to visit rooftops, then visit Mood Rooftop! The view is really stunning, and during the summer, the pool can be used as well. Good service and I would come back 🏊☺️🥂

response.snippet: Dear Julie,Thank you so much for your kind note. We look forward to welcoming back when we will be open again. Until then, take care.

If you have time and like cocktails you should take a divert and go here

reviews_data.snippet: We really wanted to go to this terrace but we got a disappointment due to the service we received, I think due to inexperience and misinterpretation of the language (Spanish). We ordered a series of dishes to share, we explicitly chose without nuts and we commented it because it was due to an allergy; We also got a salad with hazelnuts, which we had to return. We also ordered the beef chop to the point, for three times, and finally it arrived very made and in hot stone, with which the meat was spoiled. We commented, they apologized but we ended up eating the last chop of 59 euros. The rest of the food very well and the place cool. It would improve if they opened the pool area. It is higher and has better views.

response.snippet: (Translated by Google) Dear Andrea,We appreciate your comment about our terrace Mood.We are sorry that the experience has not been as positive as I expected. However, we appreciate that you have left us your opinion, this helps us correct mistakes and improve. Our wish is that what happened will not happen again on another occasion.In our standards we have established to ask our clients about allergies and intolerances. In reference to what happened with the meat, the cutlet of cow is served to the point on a hot stone so that it finishes cooking in the table of the client.We apologize and talk to our staff to try to correct and remember compliance with our standards.We hope you give us another opportunity to serve you better, we will be happy to welcome you again!Best regards,Head of Public Relations(Original)Estimada Andrea,Agradecemos su comentario acerca de nuestra terraza Mood.Sentimos mucho que la experiencia no haya sido tan positiva como esperaba. No obstante, le agradecemos que nos haya dejado su opinión, esto nos ayuda a corregir errores y mejorar. Nuestro deseo es que lo ocurrido no vuelva a suceder en otra ocasión.En nuestros estándares tenemos establecido preguntar a nuestros clientes sobre alergias e intolerancias. En referencia a lo ocurrido con la carne, la chuleta de vaca se sirve al punto sobre una piedra caliente para que se acabe de cocinar en la mesa del cliente.Le pedimos disculpas y hablaremos con nuestro personal para tratar de corregir y recordar el cumplimiento de nuestros estándares.Esperamos que nos brinde otra oportunidad para atenderle mejor, estaremos encantados de recibirle de nuevo!Saludos cordiales,Responsable Relaciones Publicas

reviews_data.snippet: The place is at the GL The One hotel, and that in a place like this one this type of practice is carried out seems unfortunate to me. We went to dinner and had a drink, we ordered a Luis Cañas (38 € VAT inc.) Hummus, it was cold from the fridge, it was not fresh, then the hamburger came, which was not bad, but it was salty, my partner asked for Tataki and he couldn't. To finish, they kindly offered him a dessert that was fine "Pan con chocolate", then we ordered a Margarita and a GTonic. When asking for the bill they charge us everything + total VAT that we paid and we commented on it to the waiter but he said that the VAT was always charged and I told him then in the Menu DO NOT PUT VAT INCLUDED, When later you charge the VAT again, it seems very ugly that everyone is fooled like that because it sure was done with all the tables, we would not return. Attention was fine, somewhat slow but fine.

response.snippet: (Translated by Google) Dear Mr. Walls,Thanks for your comments.We apologize for your confusion regarding the VAT breakdown on the account. Our letter shows all the prices with VAT included and that same amount is exactly what appears on your invoice. If you do the sum of the products consumed you will see that the prices of the invoice coincide with those of the letter and simply, complying with what the law stipulates, in each invoice it is broken down which part of the total amount corresponds to the taxable base and which part to VAT.Hoping that this explanation has helped to clear up your misunderstanding, please receive a warm greeting.(Original)Apreciado Sr. Walls,Gracias por sus comentarios.Lamentamos su confusión respecto al desglose del IVA en la cuenta. Nuestra carta muestra todos los precios con el IVA incluido y ese mismo importe es exactamente el que figura en su factura. Si hace la suma de los productos consumidos verá que los precios de la factura coinciden con los de la carta y simplemente, cumpliendo con lo que estipula la ley, en cada factura se desglosa que parte del importe total corresponde a la base imponible y que parte al IVA.Esperando que esta explicación haya ayudado a aclarar su malentendido reciba un cordial saludo.

We will not repeat and notify our friends of this scam.

reviews_data.snippet: Big no no.Expensive, very small portions and not fresh, and way too salty.Cafe was above local average.

Very Disorganized. The food was good actually, the ambience was cool (not too busy), but they only had 2 people serving for the whole entire place (plus 2 cooks from what I could see. They took our order for the "Menu" but got our first course wrong (we said tabouli, they understood salad). We paid and sat down. They didn't bring cutlery with it, and then at the very end, when went to leave, they asked us to pay... We said, we already paid, but couldn't prove it because they didn't keep the receipt and neither did we (and phone was dead). So had to pay again, and now going back to prove that it was in fact paid twice.I would suggest hiring more people so everyone's not in stress mode, but I won't be back anyways, sorry guys, it's a really cool spot.
Easily the best place to eat in Barcelona. Tastes like mamas cooking. So fresh and the staff were so attentive. Near Plaça Catalanya

I like the idea, toward healthy food. It’s nice to get a custom wok dish. The food is good and it’s a good market / restaurant concept. The only negative was the organic orange juice was basically orangina (sugar), I should have asked.
Amazing place to have a WOK nice organic vegan food and a chilled beer
I’ve been to the same one in Gracia area and it was excellent but this one was not that much... food was over cooked, not balanced. However, the staff was very kind!

Food was good and ambient is great with all fresh ingredients displayed along the store. But the service was really bad, we had to wait a lot of time at the table for a waiter to come and take our order.

Interesting place which offers organic food. Woks are very nice, you can choose each ingredient to create what you like. The portions are big enough. There is also a daily menu for around 13 euros. Good place for lunch close to Catalunya. They also have a small market which sells organic products to cook at home.
Good wok that you can create at your pleasure, democratic prices and quality food

In addition to being a restaurant, Woki is an Organic Market so you can stock up on delicious and healthy organic snacks and ingredients while you’re grabbing a bite or cup of coffee there.#WokiOrganicMarket #OrganicMarket
Moderately cheap and tastyRecommend mixed salad bowlThey got special recipe for the sauce
I came here for a work lunch the other day and had the vegan lasagna and wow it was amazing. I'd really love to try their other vegan options see how they compare.
Nice healthy&fresh food in plaza Catalunya.
Not much to choose from, but everything is top quality. They are fast to serve and very polite.

One of the tastiest organic spots in Barcelona. I love their vegan raspberry and mango cake, a slice of heaven, a must try! :) they make nice coffees too. Everything here is organic, which is great. #organic_fork
Thanks for a GREAT meal! We had the organic grilled vegetables, the green salad and organic grilled lamb - very delicious!!!
wok is good. hot sauce is not spicy

Omg, best farmer pizza ever! Girlfriend took a spinach Macaroni and the quality was there. But don't espect the spinach, this is the macaronies who are made of spinach.Recommanded to eat for 2-4 persons not that expensive.

Nice staff. Delicious food. Cozy Atmosphere. Just a perfect place.

reviews_data.snippet: Coffee (1,50 euros) was cheap and nice

A big menu for a big vegan appétit. The prices were not too high especially considering the portion size. The cake was stale when I got it at 8 pm, but the slice was quite large. My only real complaints are that the staff kept hovering and the bathrooms stank.

response.snippet: Thanks for your comments.We have a problem of odors in the sewers of the area that affect our premises and despite the incenses and to clean the bathrooms, it is difficult to solve it.We will continue working on it.

reviews_data.snippet: I really like this restaurant because food is so tasty and healthy if you don't want to eat with so much fatty ingredients and oils. Really recommend for every kind of diet you follow.Bar tenders are also very helpful when you don't understand something from the menu. Would repeat for sure
good fresh food
Fresh and healthy vegan options on the menu. Lovely environment and good service. Don’t be fooled by its location, it might be in a tourist spot but it’s a very decent place!

One of the best places for a quick and healthy lunch. Also, you can buy some organic food, tea, etc. I love the wine (kind of basic but tasty anyway) and prices are normal Barcelona prices. Please, don’t change!😄
Seems really organic because I could even see an organic coco cola but one advise please don't try vegan burger rest of the dishes are good.

fantastic place: inside you can buy everything Bio and eat at the restaurant. I've tried the burgers and the pizza and they are simply AMAZING! High quality food for normal price and inside you can stay as much as you want, with no rush!
What a great place! Everything we ordered was fresh and tasty, the staff was very nice and welcoming. Prices are very good.
Very nice place in the centre of the city. Friendly staff and very nice food. You can eat from noodles bowls to main courses, sandwiches, drink a beer or enjoy a coffee. Cheap and cozy.

Nice restaurant. The service was just not good. I ordered the vegan macaroni with tomato sauce and they put cheese on it even though I told the waiter and ordered from the vegan menu. My friend hat a lasagna which was cold. After me asking the waiter to please get me my food without the cheese and my friend asking them to reheat the lasagna, the waiter was not very happy with us. Wouldn’t go there again - though the food was good in the end.

response.snippet: Chiara,Thank you for your comments we will review all training protocols to our employees so failures like these do not happen again, our most sincere apologies.We are very sorry that the experience was not entirely good, but thanks again for giving us your opinion and the possibility of answering first hand, that helps us to improve every day, this gives us the possibility to detect our failures on a daily basis so that they do not happen again.Thank you!

reviews_data.snippet: I really like this place. Food is pretty good and service too. The only thing they should be better at is environmental consciusness. They serve water in plastic bottles. It is not coherent with the organic tag...

One of my favourite places to go to when meeting with a friend to eat something. Quick and tasty, portions are very generous and prices are alright, especially considering the quality of the ingredients used. The place itself is not the cosiest but it's functional either for a casual lunch or for a romantic dinner due to the variety of rooms they have. Drinks are also great, alcoholic or non-alcoholic. Most of their stuff is organic and a lot of it can also be bought as a supermarket item and taken home.

response.snippet: Hi David, we are glad you habe enjoyed Woki Organic Market. Hope to see you soon!

reviews_data.snippet: It was good. Nice atmosphere and service but no separate cooking for vegan.

One of my favourite cafes when I'm in Barcelona. It also has a little organic market with lots of produce, meat, teas and other products... And good coffee with alternative milks - almond, soy, etc. Not the cheapest but a good place to go if you want wholesome food. Sugar-free and gluten-free brownies are super yum.

response.snippet: Thank you Amber, hope to see you soon!!

reviews_data.snippet: Great market and restaurant! I went there for lunch with a friend and the food was outstanding and the portions generous.Will definitely visit again!

We went to wiki organic market to eat dinner, definitely a unique vibe to the place given it sells produce but also has tables scattered around for serving meals.We started with the nachos which were great, my partner had the wok which she really enjoyed, I had the chicken for my main meal, it was very average, but overall we really enjoyed the experience of the restaurant.We also grabbed a few items on our way out (like organic chocolate) which was a great bonus.The staff were extremely friendly and helpful.

Nice atmosphere and veggies are definitely the stars here. The wok bowls are more veggie than noodle and the veggies are crisp and fresh. Sauces are light to not distract and tofu is a little smoky. Delicious!

response.snippet: Great! Thank you very much!

reviews_data.snippet: Nice healthy food. Easy going restaurant/market. Hidden gem next to plaza Catalunya for quick bite.

I’m not going to return the deal to the customer is lousy, the tables are dirty and when you ask the waiter to clean it please he do it reluctantly and looking badly, they forget the commands and make you wait for a long time to bring it to the table. It is a pity that in such a place where food is good, that is indisputable, have as employees people with such bad education and little desire to do their job well.
Food was very tasty, some I had never eaten, enjoyed tasting.

This is a great restaurant/market selling and serving organic & healthy food. It is very hip and nicely decorated, the menu looks like a newspaper (which is a nice detail) with plenty of options to pick from including burgers, Asian dishes, tapas, salads… The service is quick and the food tastes very good.

Nice restaurant. I like the interior and the open kitchen. The vegetarian offer could be increased. I had a stir fry and it was very good. The prices of smoothies are a bit too high but they are tasty. The place is quite busy during the weekend. They sell organic groceries as well. They have another grocery shop in Gracia with a bigger choice.
Fantastic lively atmosphere. This business would feel right at home in Melbourne. The menu has a wide variety and the shelves/takeaway grocer is well presented and approachable.
Food isn't very good, and rather boring. And they served a sauce that was tasted bad and smelled nasty, I think it was too old. Te atmosphere and the staff are nice though so I put 1 stars.
Delicious curry dishes. Papas were yummy too. Good vegan and gluten free choices.

reviews_data.snippet: Beautiful restaurant, with organic food, vegetarian option. Not too expensive and we service was nice.

very good restaurant, food is very tasty and authentic. we tried the wok and the burger and they were both amazing! Go for it ;)
Just ok. Didn't find food very true to their names. For instance the noodles with Thai red curry tasted very sweet and bland.

Food (lasagna) was ok but the service is one of the worst I have ever seen...We went there before leaving the city with my girlfriend and had a bus to catch so we went early to be good. The waitress misunderstood our order and thought we were going to take one meal for two people...yeah right...but unfortunately we figured that out about 30 min after the order (still didn't have any plate at that time). Anyway she didn't even have the decency of apologizing or saying anything to us about it, overall it took us aaaaaages to have 2 lasagnas (8 people in the restaurant when we got there) nearly missed the bus but hell I was hungry so I wanted my damn lasagna ! Not a single smile or apologize from anyone there even though we said we were unhappy about the service at the cashier...keep up the good work haha !
Delicious woks, perfect for vegans. Very good value for money especially for everything being organic.
Its a nice place and stuff is friendly. I ordered the lasagna for 10 euros and got a pice 10x10cm big. I asked for a bigger portion and they kindly brought me a second piece.

response.snippet: Hello Dani, thanks for your post.We love that you like Woki Organic Market, we work with love and professionalism every day to get it.Hope to see you soon.Best regards

reviews_data.snippet: Great organic restaurant hidden behind a grocery store. The dishes are quite simple, but the quality of the produce is so good that every bite is a pleasure. I'll definitely go back here on my next trip to Barcelona!
amazing food and great quality! it is worth every penny :)
Food of the highest quality, mostly from local farmers, always organic and healthy. For a moderately low price you can eat a meal so big you can't even move afterwards!

Had a very tasty and colourful salad. Food was well prepared and fresh, there was a bit of confusion with ordering though. It's half table service, half pay at counter. Decent veg and vegan options, fairly priced for the quality.
I really like the concept of this place. Little organic market feeling within a decent restaurant, not too noisy, calm and cosy. Super friendly staff and good food.

response.snippet: Thank you very much!

reviews_data.snippet: We had hummus with bread as a starter and then Wok as a main dish. The hummus with tomato bread was nice. The Wok dishes can be individually condigured, starting from the type of rice or noodle to the protein you want (beef/chicken/shrimps/tofu). The food itself was really delicious and the amount of shrimps in my Wok was insane, but there was so much sauce that the lower fourth of my food was swimming in it.There could be more time between the arrival of the starters and the main dish. We had barely touched the hummus when the main dishes arrived so that the table was very full and the tomate bread had gone cold before we got to eat all of it.

response.snippet: Hello, we are glad that you have enjoyed your experience. We will discuss with our kitchen team to improve  the times between start and main start and main

reviews_data.snippet: Multiple choices for everyone and a great vegan menu. Our waiter was not friendly and looked quite bored. Food is always good and ambient is nice.

reviews_data.snippet: Food ok but be aware of what you get to eat it not always doesnt meet your order

A constant love hate relationship for me going to Woki. The wok is not a proper wok and portiona are irrationally small. So, just be ready for this!I like the concept (of organic market+place to eat), but Woki can get very crowded and you then need to wait hours for your food. I wish waiters could flag this before ordering...EDIT, and replying to your response :-)I understand about the personal taste and that you've been following the same recipe in the past 6years but yes, as you said, to my taste the wok shouldn't be full of lettuce (salade), but rather veggies. Once I even asked for a wok with chichken and veggies only and I got warm lettuce with chicken.. I mean..As to the waiting time, I get that you can be super-busy during certain periods of the day, but it happened to me already twice (in past two weeks) that the waiting wasn't flagged, we ordered food and waited an entire hour.By simply flagging this some people would leave being completely happy, but in my humble opinion this should be flagged upfront at all times.

response.snippet: Dear Kitti,Thanks for your comments.We have to tell you that the woks we are cooking in Woki Organic Market are the same ones we have been doing since we started this project more than 6 years ago.We have always been known for making abundant and tasty woks but in the end it is always a matter of personal tastes and perceptions, we hope you can come back to savor our woksRegarding the waits, we will try to review the protocols of the waiters' commands as well as in the kitchen to see if we can avoid delays, but when the restaurant is full, as we always cook the woks at the moment that implies that sometimes there are delays, but it is not the usual scenario.We also inform you that when there is a collapse in the wok kitchen or any other kitchen, the waiters always warn our customers. If this has not been the case, we will review the messages that the waiters are giving to our customers to be able to make them more effective so that the customer experience in Woki Organic Market is as much satisfactory as posible.

reviews_data.snippet: if no stars were a option I would give this! the staff we rude and ignorant! we ask for our food to be well done and it came raw with blood,one of our party got sick later and when I asked for the food to be well done like requested,I got attitude and the plate slapped down to me! too expensive for raw food! do not go here

response.snippet: Dear Laura,Thank you for your comments we will review all training protocols to our employees so failures like these do not happen again, our most sincere apologies.We are very sorry that the experience was not entirely good, but thanks again for giving us your opinion and the possibility of answering first hand, that helps us to improve every day, this gives us the possibility to detect our failures on a daily basis so that they do not happen again.Thank you!

Maybe the restaurant is good, I haven't tried, the organic market is quite bad

response.snippet: Thank you very much for sharing your opinion with us .We will take your suggestions into consideration in order to improve our services. We recommend you to come to our Organic Market shop in order to do your grocery shopping, here you will find a wide range of ecological products, both packed and fresh, as well as a cafeteria with artisan and eco bread made by ourselves. We have nine supermarkets all around Barcelona. We hope you can come and change your mind. Kind regards.
