The food was incredible. I had fish (lubina)w centolla (i think is the name of the sauce) and it was super good. Also desserts were amazing. The only bad thing is that it was a big group (around 30 people) and they didnt let us pay separately which I believe doesnt make any sense.
Very good. Had live music, delicious food, etc... my fish came out to my table in salt bake that was light on fire and then skinned live at table for me... awesome
They have variety of food. Try the weekdays menu, really worth it. Excellent service!
Very cool interior and the service was TOP! Cocktails also deserve their own mention. Delicious

I cannot leave a review as per se, while I wasn't attended. I went on my bike, first the waiter told me I cannot have just any table (only the outer ones, in the street, no heat thingy). I was ok, went to the bathroom, he watched my bike meannwhile... I asked for the drinks menú. Just fine. I'm doing this long, because my -stars have a reason. Since I was the newest client on the terrace I was craving for a beer, but no. After 5 minutes the waiter disapeared. I was looking something on my phone, 10 minutes. I went looking for the waiter, nobody was there. I just left.The long short story is that I went inside for the bathroom. Inside there were , like we say in Barcelona, more waiters than clients. So, waiting for 15 min to get an order it was to much. So I was not served.Went 10 feet to next place, I had a beer and a glass of wine in 2 minutos. I even wrote the review under 15 min.I'm don't think it is a bad place. But for their prestige, they went the lowest quality of service.
Shaking my head with a smile, deco fancy wanna be and food fast food level but not as good as MC’s or KFC, and the light is so dim inside that I can’t help asking, what are you trying to do here?
Amazing restaurant, paella was excellent, as was the service and wine.
Top atmosphere, great food, great service. 5 stars!
This place never disappoints me. I have been many times now and food and atmosphere is always good. I recommend their seafood paella. And best of all their menu is very reasonably priced.

Beautiful restaurant and staff super welcoming. The tartar of tuna ans the ceviche of salmon were super good. A bit disappointed about the entrecote. The meet was not crazy and the salsa without any taste. It was a good night anyway and the price is good for the decorum

Very good experience. Nice and relaxed atmosphere with good relaxed music. I would describe it as modern-retro style. Friendly and inviting staff. Always available and ready to help, very polite.The food was very good and perfect timing between starter, main and dessert. Good range of different wines and foods in the menu.Will definitely visit again during my stay in Barcelona. Recommended.

One of my favourite restaurants in Barcelona, with a great atmosphere. The service is excellent and the food exceeds. Sometimes there's live music, which makes the decor even better. The menu has a great variation, with an accent on fish, but also a range of tapas and some sushi/Japanese food. Fits all tastes. I would definitely recommend this place, especially being located far from the touristic areas, yet very central
O.M.G. it was delicious affordable and fancy. Loved my Caldoso Rice, Lobster was good, seafood soup is a must.

The place was recommended to us by the guy at the front desk, at our hotel. We had a group of 6 people and a great experience.We had a great experience. The service was excellent and the food (a variety of sea food) delicious. Later live music was going on.

The cheesecake was frozen and the sangria tasted like heavy sweet syrup. The seafood in the overpriced paella was good but the rice portion was way too salty. Overall I'm giving this place two stars because they took the dessert and drink off the bill.
Cozy restaurant. You feel like in a boat (titanic). Daily menu 12.50€ with appetizer, main dish bread, dessert and drink. Excellent service.
The menu for San Esteban was great.
Tasty seafood
Such a disappointment
Great paella!
Outstanding seafood, very well prepared. Friendly and generous with portions. The best food we had this week in Barca. Highly recommended.

£50 for two tapas and two drinks?Food was overly priced and definitely not worth its value. Padron peppers were very bitter and not fully fried. Cocktail was ultimately disappointing and tasted like syrup.The waitress could not speak English and attempted to sell more tapas dishes. Please be aware and check your bill!!!

It's not worth the walk and price. The worst food we had during our one week stay in Barcelona. You will find much better restaurants for a better value. Would not go there again, despite being recommended by the hotel.
Amazingly ritzy atmosphere with a more casual price. Went there our first night in Barcelona, fantastic jazz band-Toni was fabulous!! Definitely a must visit!!

Excellent restaurant that was recommended to us by one of our hotel’s employees. We went for lunch our first day in Barcelona and ordered the gazpacho, fried eggplant with honey, and baby squid. Everything was fantastic and the squid were some of the best I’ve had. We went back later that day for dinner and ordered paella. It was good but not as good as somewhere that specializes in paella. The decor is wonderful, the staff is friendly, and the prices are competitive.
Nice atmosphere & good service. The Paella was delicious. But the burger was a bit salty. Overall it was a nice place. I'd recommend this place.

Recommended by our host. A bit pricey for being a bit further from the city center, but so worth it. Interesting menu, had sushi with Spanish food. Ordered two appys and two paellas to share. So delicious!!!!! Defo recommend!

Exceptional service, Great food. Sangria (Alcohol) was very good! The paella is a must eat and the grilled chicken was very good. The restaurant was recommended by a bakery 1 block away named Macxipa which also was very good (and cheap)! Overall the place is beautiful and is one of the best places me and my wife have ever eaten.

One of the best meals I have ever had! We had so many tapas, and the grilled octopus was phenomenal. The paella dish was so good and comes in a huge pan. So make sure you are hungry! Our waiter was superb too and had great recommendations. If I ever get back to Barcelona I am eating here again!
Very nice and clean. The seafood was tasty. Good to make a wow effect in a date
Beautiful decor, and delicious food. We all had fish/seafood and enjoyed it. The portions were very good sizes.
Went here for a work dinner. Staff was super friendly and helpful and the food and drinks were delicious! Definite looking forward to going back for a meal on our own.
This turned out to be be our best dining experience in Barcelona. Good atmosphere, live music when we visited, and good food and service. I would definitely recommend.
Love the interior. Sea Bass was amazing. Lovely staff.

They said to wait 2 minute for a table we wit for 20 minute and see other people arrived after us have a table before... When we said that they give us a table after 10 minutes.. We ordered the food and one champagne bottle 150€ and that arrived after 20 minutes and after the food only when we asked for that... In the end we pay and we ordered 2 shoots but they never arrived and after 10 minutes we go out!!!
Terrible. We ordered steak for Christmas works dinner and got the bottom of a shoe. I've lived in bcn for 18 years this is the worse
Absolutely Delicious, the food is so fresh! The drinks are divine and you couldn’t ask for more welcoming staff! Highly recommend to anyone traveling through Barcelona

Beautiful bar and restaurant. Vibrant and hip feel could easily be in NYC’s meatpacking or flatiron district. Enjoyed drinks and ceviche at the bar. My dirty martini was excellent and my partner enjoyed her caipirinha! If we didn’t already have dinner plans, we would stay for a full meal.
Great food and atmosphere. Recommend the salmon nikkei
One of The best place i have eaten at, The food, The service and the enviroment inside The restaurant oozes quality. Also its not too expensive and there is alot to choose from. 10 out of 10
The food was excellent. The ambiance was nice and the servers were friendly. Definitely would recommend it and would go again!
My family and I love eating here! The food is good and they also make great drinks. The staff is so kind and wonderful as well! The live music and the private room options are a great addition
One of the best bistro bar restaurants in barcelona... recommended to anyone who visits and lives their. Delicious menu and very nice live performances. The service is ideal and absolutely loved it.
The food was good, the atmosphere was great it was packed in the middle week. Service was good as well. All in all a 4 star experience
Tan tan ramen is the must try. Nice arouma of spices and well cooked chicken

There are so many negatives to give regarding my experience with this restaurant. A group of about 13 friends traveled to Barcelona for a birthday trip. Seating such a large group was prompt. Upon entering my boyfriend had a small luggage that we had recently purchased. The hostess, approached him and due to the language barrier we couldn’t understand what she was asking so we waited and then when told where the table was, we started to walk. She then raised her voice and asked referring to my boyfriend, “Is he always like this?”. I asked her what she was trying to relay and then we understood that she wanted to check the bag. A simple situation immediately turned hostile.The process of ordering went well! I ordered the salmon and veggies. The salmon had NO seasoning. The portion size was decent. The ambiance was very nice and a DJ was setting up in our area as well for later hours I’m assuming.Towards the end of dinner, a friend asked the Manager if they offered anything FREE for birthdays. He advised that he would locate something. A couple of minutes thereafter we were brought out champagne flutes for a toast. Prior to drinking them we inquired on who ordered them and were they free. Our server advised us not to worry about anything. So we proceeded with the toast. A couple of minutes after that we were brought 6 different desserts to sample. Again, we asked who ordered them and if they were free and we received the same response.After we received the bill, we noticed that the champagne and desserts were charged. My friend immediately spoke with the manager Juan and the waiter regarding the charges. After discussing the issues for about 30 mins, she was told that NOTHING is ever free and they would accept half of the charges. After all of the bills were paid, the manager Juan brought out a round of shots to the table as a “bandaid” regarding the issue.I would not recommend this restaurant to ANY tourist based upon the lack of service, deception, and quality of food. This was definitely not a memorable experience. The food was also pricey in comparison to the quality.
Vert nice food and service. We were a huge group but they were on top all the time. Making sure everything was there and got.

Wow! The decor, the food and the service were all excellent. If in the Muntaner/ Diagonal area, you have to stop in and have lunch. Thursday they have live music at night. Don't let the out side steer you away.
Nice atmosphere, but poor overrall experience. The steak on a 50€ menu was a cheap 5€ beef, what a joke!! No manager to take action, don’t eat there!!
Beautiful restaurant. Tasty fish. Good place for business dinner.

Just amazing! The food is just perfect. They serve not only typically for Spain paella but many other delicious fishes. Cocktails are awesome too (we had a mojito). The service/waiter was so good, that I thought that I'm a king. Please notice: I'm not overreacting! One of the best meals of my life. The higher price is justified.
It was good but why the music band plays near the WC?
Visited this restaurant that specializes in seafood, mediterranean dishes because it was recommended to me by my college. the food is tasty and the atmosphere friendly

Friendly service, but underqualified. Great atmosphere. Paella was partly undercooked. Paella was dumped on the table with 2 spoons, "good luck". Was presented a chemical lemon solution napkin to clean our hands afterwards.All in all, there are better places in Barcelona for less, which kind of also qualifies almost all other restaurants
Food was amazing. Great atmosphere. Beautiful decor
Very good staff, location, food and price.I recommend it to everyone. There is also live music!!
Beautiful place. Good food. A lot of space
Good food and atmosphere. Family restaurant or a great place for business meals
Nice food good services really enjoyed
This restaurant was close to our hotel. We went back to Patron for dinner 3 nights in a row. The food was outstanding and live music made the experience even more enjoyable.
Amazing restaurant in a good location in Barcelona. With DJ and superb food and service the conclusion is amazing!

We went twice - once with a large group and once with just a few friends and enjoyed both visits. There are so many great places to eat in Barcelona, but I would return to this one if I were lucky enough to return to that beautiful city

Service was excellent (they even provided complimentary champagne when they heard it was my birthday complete with candles and sang happy birthday). Food was a little rich for my palate, but beautifully cooked.
Excellent food and friendly staff who speak English well. Will definitely visit again!
Main advantages of this place are incredibly tasty food and good service. Can't say that I like an interior a lot, but I highly recommend Patron for those who would like to spend enjoyable evening.
Nice and relaxed atmosphere with live music in the evening.Very good experience.

Visited 25/03/2018, very nice ambience with life music (started after 21h). We ordered octopus, croquettes, fish of the day in salt and some other food. Everything was very fast and fresh served.we liked a lot the service and food. Our friend proposed tonight to his girlfriend and this evening for sure we will remember for ever) and thanks to our camarero - he helped us to bring the ring and to make a real surprise ! We will recommend to all our friends this place!
Good location for Tapas & spending night time. Is there any better place? Answer is yes, "El Nacional".
Classic Barcelona dining, and very spacious and fun.
Five of us (three teenagers) and the food and beverages were excellent!
Lovely restaurant only had drinks but the food that was being served looked fabulous

Very, very nice lunch. They started us off with a glass of hot fish broth and terrific crusty rolls (the bread is just fabulous in the Iberian peninsula. We decided on the menu del día, which is usually a great way to go. For our fist course, two of us had their mixed green salad, with apple vinaigrette. The tomatoes were so good. Another bad their fabada, a thick "soup" of white beans and veggies (very filling) and I had fried sonso (tiny sandeels) with an orange mayo. For our main course, we all ordered veal picaña, with roasted potatoes and green garlic sauce. It was delicious, but the picaña was just a tad chewy, but the flavor was excellent. We all agreed that more sauce would be a good thing! Their sangria was a bit sweet for me, but the others liked it. For dessert. I had the fresh fruit cup, two of us had coconut ice cream and our fourth person had "cake". All in all the food was very good, the portions were large enough without being too large and each meal wasE13.50. The service was a bit on the slow side and the wait staff seemed distracted, but they were busy. We would definitely return, and you should go, too.
The food is very good and the staff super nice
Excellent place to relax and enjoy a great plate 🍽
Amazing seafood, followed by great cocktails
Absolutely marvellous restaurant, finest seafood and seaman ambient .. Just must have seen!

Some of the food was great, some awful. Service was pushy, unable to explain well the wine or the food, rushing you along to order when dining room is almost empty. Felt like the place turns into a club with dancing later on although not sure. DJ presence was the possible give away.
Always good day and night
Good place to eat ,👻❗🗽
Good service and fresh sea food. I love this place.

The seafood paella was the worst I have ever tasted !! Had to keep reminding our waiter that he had forgotten our drink. Loud music spoilt our conversation. Even the complimentary drink at the end tasted awful.Overall not a good experience.
Exquisite seafood and excellent service! Top of the notch atmosphere with live music!
Good food and good service!
Food was delicious and service was great! There was awesome live music as well.
Food was amazing quality and the staff are outstanding and knowledgeable about their menu. Would happily recommend to anyone looking for a 5 star meal without paying a 5 star price

Enormous! Nicely. Decorated. Nice staff
Good food and service!
Great food, great service.
Went for Christmas dinner which was great until it was completely spoiled by being served a poor cut of meat when paying for an entrecôte. Terrible response from the management. Avoid this place.

I enjoy a lot their ambience inspired by a cruiser. Cocktails are good.

One of the good restaurants in Barcelona. All the stars and celebrities visited this restaurant and its full of pictures over the wall with the celebrities and the owner
Food was really good, service was amazing and ambient is beautiful. Will come again.
The atmosphere and service was descent. Our grilled octopus was under cooked and salty. The cod was bland. This was the most expensive and most underwhelming meal we have had in Barcelona.
